The Society of Automotive Engineers of China should firmly grasp the historical opportunity of technological change in the automotive industry, and continue to do a good job in the article on building an innovation chain around the industrial chain in accordance with the general requirements of the China Association for Science and Technology of "Three Services, One Strengthening", and reflect its innovative development. Value, with innovative ideas to promote the work of the Society to develop in depth.

title: T6处理对超声处理A356流变挤铸件组织与性能的影响
abstract: 采用自制功率超声双声场装置制备A356半固态浆料,在YB32-200四柱液压机上进行流变挤压铸造成形,研究了625、615、605℃成形件T6处理前后的组织与力学性能。结果表明,T6处理原始组织中alpha-Al+Si共晶组织不同程度地固溶到初晶alpha-Al中,并在时效过程中弥散析出一些细小的强化相Mg_2Si;抗拉强度与伸长率都得到了提高,其中抗拉强度在615℃时最高,达到了241.20MPa,伸长率在605℃时最大,达到了17.88%。
text: t6处理对超声处理a356流变挤铸件组织与性能的影响 采用自制功率超声双声场装置制备a356半固态浆料在yb32200四柱液压机上进行流变挤压铸造成形研究了625、615、605℃成形件t6处理前后的组织与力学性能。结果表明t6处理原始组织中alphaalsi共晶组织不同程度地固溶到初晶alphaal中并在时效过程中弥散析出一些细小的强化相mg2si抗拉强度与伸长率都得到了提高其中抗拉强度在615℃时最高达到了24120mpa伸长率在605℃时最大达到了1788。
en_title: Effect of T6 Treatment on Microstructure and Properties of Ultrasonic-treated A356 Rheological Castings
en_abstract: A356 semi-solid slurry was prepared by a self-made power ultrasonic dual-sound field device, and the rheological extrusion casting was performed on a YB32-200 four-column hydraulic press. The results show that the alpha-Al+Si eutectic structure in the original structure treated with T6 is solid-dissolved into the primary crystal alpha-Al to varying degrees, and some fine strengthening phases Mg_2Si are dispersed and precipitated during the aging process; tensile strength and elongation All have been improved, in which the tensile strength is the highest at 615℃, reaching 241.20MPa, and the elongation is the highest at 605℃, reaching 17.88%.

title: 北京翰海  鉴古烁今  佳作纷呈  十余专场多元选择
abstract: <正>北京翰海将于5月31日-6月5日举行2016春季拍卖会,此次春拍推出近现代、古代书画,宝聚斋中国书画,当代书画、油画雕塑、小雅观心专场以及古籍善本、紫砂艺术、金铜佛像、玉器、古董珍玩等十余专场,每一专场均是翰海坚持数年、经验丰富的常设专场。同时还首次推出"盛世繁华——古董珍玩专场"以铜器、文房为主,并首次引入西洋钟表、乐器
text: 北京翰海 鉴古烁今 佳作纷呈 十余专场多元选择 正北京翰海将于5月31日6月5日举行2016春季拍卖会此次春拍推出近现代、古代书画宝聚斋中国书画当代书画、油画雕塑、小雅观心专场以及古籍善本、紫砂艺术、金铜佛像、玉器、古董珍玩等十余专场每一专场均是翰海坚持数年、经验丰富的常设专场。同时还首次推出盛世繁华——古董珍玩专场以铜器、文房为主并首次引入西洋钟表、乐器
en_title: Beijing Hanhai, from the past and present, there are many masterpieces, more than ten special performances with multiple choices
en_abstract: <正>Beijing Hanhai will hold the 2016 Spring Auction from May 31st to June 5th. The Spring Auction will launch modern and ancient painting and calligraphy, Baojuzhai Chinese painting and calligraphy, contemporary painting and calligraphy, oil painting and sculpture, and Xiaoya Guanxin. As well as more than ten specials such as rare books of ancient books, purple sand art, gold and bronze Buddha statues, jades, antiques and treasures, each special is a permanent special that Hanhai has insisted on for several years and has rich experience. At the same time, the "Prosperity in a Prosperous Age - Antiques and Treasures Special" was also launched for the first time, focusing on bronze ware and study rooms, and introduced Western clocks and musical instruments for the first time.

title: 医院人事档案信息化建设与信息化管理的实现途径
abstract: 伴随着我国计算机技术的不断进步,实现计算机信息化管理已经成为很多企业内部人事管理的主要路径,我国医院规模近几年在不断扩大,人数和范围也在增加,特别是编制外人员数量也在增多,这就为医院的人事档案管理带来了一定的压力,通过引进信息化建设和信息化管理项目能大大提升医院的工作效率。本文从信息化建设的分析、信息化管理的制度、信息化建设与信息化管理的时效性、同步性四个方面阐述了医院人事档案信息化金额和和信息化管理的实现路径,旨在为医院人员管理人员提供有价值的意见,以供参考。
text: 医院人事档案信息化建设与信息化管理的实现途径 伴随着我国计算机技术的不断进步实现计算机信息化管理已经成为很多企业内部人事管理的主要路径我国医院规模近几年在不断扩大人数和范围也在增加特别是编制外人员数量也在增多这就为医院的人事档案管理带来了一定的压力通过引进信息化建设和信息化管理项目能大大提升医院的工作效率。本文从信息化建设的分析、信息化管理的制度、信息化建设与信息化管理的时效性、同步性四个方面阐述了医院人事档案信息化金额和和信息化管理的实现路径旨在为医院人员管理人员提供有价值的意见以供参考。
en_title: The realization way of hospital personnel file information construction and information management
en_abstract: With the continuous progress of computer technology in our country, the realization of computer information management has become the main path for internal personnel management of many enterprises. The scale of hospitals in my country has been expanding in recent years, and the number and scope are also increasing, especially the number of personnel outside the establishment. This brings a certain pressure to the hospital's personnel file management. By introducing information construction and information management projects, the work efficiency of the hospital can be greatly improved. This paper expounds the realization path of hospital personnel file informatization amount and informatization management from four aspects: the analysis of informatization construction, the system of informatization management, the timeliness of informatization construction and informatization management, and the synchronization. The hospital personnel management personnel provide valuable opinions for reference.

title: 双进双出钢球磨煤机变频直驱高效传动链技术研究
abstract: 为提高双进双出钢球磨煤机的传动效率,降低磨煤电耗,对双进双出钢球磨煤机的磨煤原理进行了研究,对磨煤机在运行中存在空耗的原因进行了分析。在此基础上,提出了变频直驱高效传动链技术,进行了节能降耗效果与经济性分析。这一技术有利于实现双进双出钢球磨煤机的智能化运行,满足锅炉负荷的调峰需求,节能效果显著。
text: 双进双出钢球磨煤机变频直驱高效传动链技术研究 为提高双进双出钢球磨煤机的传动效率降低磨煤电耗对双进双出钢球磨煤机的磨煤原理进行了研究对磨煤机在运行中存在空耗的原因进行了分析。在此基础上提出了变频直驱高效传动链技术进行了节能降耗效果与经济性分析。这一技术有利于实现双进双出钢球磨煤机的智能化运行满足锅炉负荷的调峰需求节能效果显著。
en_title: Research on high-efficiency transmission chain technology of variable frequency direct drive for double-inlet and double-outlet ball mill
en_abstract: In order to improve the transmission efficiency of the double-inlet and double-tap steel ball mill, and reduce the power consumption of coal grinding, the coal milling principle of the double-inlet and double-tap ball mill was studied, and the reasons for the empty consumption of the coal mill in operation were discussed. analyze. On this basis, the variable frequency direct drive high-efficiency transmission chain technology is proposed, and the effect of energy saving and consumption reduction and economic analysis are carried out. This technology is conducive to realizing the intelligent operation of the double-inlet and double-outlet ball mill, meeting the demand for peak regulation of boiler load, and achieving significant energy-saving effect.

title: 基于CAE分析的压铸模具激光仿生强化关键技术研究
abstract:
本文利用CAE分析确定压铸模具表面容易出现热疲劳失效的部位,根据仿生学原理,使用激光强化技术对此部位进行强化处理,以提高压铸模具的使用寿命。主要包括以下内容：
第一章阐述了本文的研究背景、意义、技术路线与内容。首先介绍了压铸模具材料的失效形式与提高模具热疲劳性能的方法；接着介绍了模具激光仿生强化技术,并指出现有技术的不足；之后介绍了压铸模具CAE分析技术；最后介绍了本文的技术路线和主要研究内容。
第二章研究了压铸成型过程温度场数值模拟方法。首先建立了压铸成型过程温度场分析理论；接着建立了压铸成型过程模拟系统工作流程,并对压铸充型凝固过程进行仿真,得到铸件和模具的温度场分布；最后根据仿真结果,初步指出模具上易产生热裂纹的部位。
第三章研究了压铸成型过程应力场数值模拟方法。首先建立了压铸过程应力场分析理论；接着将第二章的温度场仿真结果作为热载荷,进行热应力有限元分析；最后分析了应力场数值模拟结果,进一步指出模具可能出现热裂纹的部位,并与实际压铸生产的模具进行对比,验证预测结果的正确性。
第四章研究了模具表面激光仿生强化技术。首先介绍了激光强化设备的系统组成；之后建立了激光仿生强化单元体横截面轮廓模型,通过对强化过的材料进行硬度测试、分析单元体的组织结构,指出了强化原理；使用正交试验研究了激光加工参数对单元体质量的影响,并得到最优加工参数；最后通过实验验证了激光仿生强化处理使得材料的热疲劳性能得到提高。
第五章对激光仿生强化技术进行了产品应用研究。对合作单位不同批次的压铸模具进行强化处理,生产实践表明,激光仿生强化处理将模具的寿命提高了1倍以上,带来了显著的经济效益。
第六章总结全文的研究成果,并展望后续工作。
text: 基于cae分析的压铸模具激光仿生强化关键技术研究 本文利用cae分析确定压铸模具表面容易出现热疲劳失效的部位根据仿生学原理使用激光强化技术对此部位进行强化处理以提高压铸模具的使用寿命。主要包括以下内容： 第一章阐述了本文的研究背景、意义、技术路线与内容。首先介绍了压铸模具材料的失效形式与提高模具热疲劳性能的方法；接着介绍了模具激光仿生强化技术并指出现有技术的不足；之后介绍了压铸模具cae分析技术；最后介绍了本文的技术路线和主要研究内容。 第二章研究了压铸成型过程温度场数值模拟方法。首先建立了压铸成型过程温度场分析理论；接着建立了压铸成型过程模拟系统工作流程并对压铸充型凝固过程进行仿真得到铸件和模具的温度场分布；最后根据仿真结果初步指出模具上易产生热裂纹的部位。 第三章研究了压铸成型过程应力场数值模拟方法。首先建立了压铸过程应力场分析理论；接着将第二章的温度场仿真结果作为热载荷进行热应力有限元分析；最后分析了应力场数值模拟结果进一步指出模具可能出现热裂纹的部位并与实际压铸生产的模具进行对比验证预测结果的正确性。 第四章研究了模具表面激光仿生强化技术。首先介绍了激光强化设备的系统组成；之后建立了激光仿生强化单元体横截面轮廓模型通过对强化过的材料进行硬度测试、分析单元体的组织结构指出了强化原理；使用正交试验研究了激光加工参数对单元体质量的影响并得到最优加工参数；最后通过实验验证了激光仿生强化处理使得材料的热疲劳性能得到提高。 第五章对激光仿生强化技术进行了产品应用研究。对合作单位不同批次的压铸模具进行强化处理生产实践表明激光仿生强化处理将模具的寿命提高了1倍以上带来了显著的经济效益。 第六章总结全文的研究成果并展望后续工作。
en_title: Research on key technology of laser bionic strengthening of die-casting mold based on CAE analysis
en_abstract:
In this paper, CAE analysis is used to determine the surface of the die-casting mold that is prone to thermal fatigue failure. According to the principle of bionics, laser strengthening technology is used to strengthen this part to improve the service life of the die-casting mold. Mainly include the following:
The first chapter expounds the research background, significance, technical route and content of this paper. Firstly, the failure mode of die-casting mold material and the method of improving the thermal fatigue performance of the mold are introduced; then the laser bionic strengthening technology of the mold is introduced, and the deficiencies of the existing technology are pointed out; then the CAE analysis technology of the die-casting mold is introduced; finally, the technology of this paper is introduced Route and main research content.
The second chapter studies the numerical simulation method of temperature field in die casting process. Firstly, the temperature field analysis theory of die-casting molding process is established; then, the workflow of the die-casting molding process simulation system is established, and the mold filling and solidification process of die-casting is simulated to obtain the temperature field distribution of castings and molds; finally, according to the simulation results, it is preliminarily pointed out that the Areas prone to thermal cracks.
The third chapter studies the numerical simulation method of the stress field in the die-casting process. Firstly, the stress field analysis theory of the die casting process is established; then, the simulation results of the temperature field in Chapter 2 are used as thermal loads, and the thermal stress finite element analysis is carried out; finally, the numerical simulation results of the stress field are analyzed, and the parts where thermal cracks may occur in the mold are further pointed out. And compared with the actual die-casting mold to verify the correctness of the predicted results.
The fourth chapter studies the laser bionic strengthening technology of mold surface. Firstly, the system composition of the laser strengthening equipment was introduced; then, the cross-sectional profile model of the laser bionic strengthening unit was established. By testing the hardness of the strengthened material and analyzing the structure of the unit body, the strengthening principle was pointed out; the orthogonal experiment was used to study The influence of laser processing parameters on the quality of the unit body was studied, and the optimal processing parameters were obtained. Finally, it was verified by experiments that the thermal fatigue performance of the material was improved by the laser biomimetic strengthening treatment.
The fifth chapter studies the product application of laser bionic enhancement technology. Strengthening treatment of different batches of die-casting molds of cooperative units, production practice shows that laser bionic enhancement treatment increases the life of molds by more than 1 times, and brings significant economic benefits.
The sixth chapter summarizes the research results of the full text and looks forward to the follow-up work.

title: 广东省佛山市高明区青少年碘营养状况的调查分析
abstract: 目的评价佛山市高明区青少年(12～17岁)碘营养状况。方法分别抽取城区及农村地区部分初、高中学生共200名(男女各半)作为调查对象,检测尿碘水平及通过触诊结合B超检查甲状腺大小。结果 200名青少年中尿碘中位数为279.2μg/L,尿碘频数分布为:<100μg/L的样本为10%,100～199μg/L的样本为51%,200～299μg/L的样本为34.5%,≥300μg/L的样本为4.5%;甲状腺肿大率为4.5%。结论高明区青少年(12～17岁)碘营养状况水平总体处于适宜,中位数偏高属超过适宜量。
text: 广东省佛山市高明区青少年碘营养状况的调查分析 目的评价佛山市高明区青少年12～17岁碘营养状况。方法分别抽取城区及农村地区部分初、高中学生共200名男女各半作为调查对象检测尿碘水平及通过触诊结合b超检查甲状腺大小。结果 200名青少年中尿碘中位数为2792μgl尿碘频数分布为100μgl的样本为10100～199μgl的样本为51200～299μgl的样本为345≥300μgl的样本为45甲状腺肿大率为45。结论高明区青少年12～17岁碘营养状况水平总体处于适宜中位数偏高属超过适宜量。
en_title: Investigation and analysis on iodine nutrition status of adolescents in Gaoming District, Foshan City, Guangdong Province
en_abstract: Objective To evaluate the iodine nutritional status of adolescents (12-17 years old) in Gaoming District, Foshan City. Methods A total of 200 junior and senior high school students (half male and female) were selected from urban and rural areas as the survey objects. The urine iodine level was detected and the thyroid size was checked by palpation combined with B-ultrasound. Results The median urinary iodine among the 200 adolescents was 279.2 μg/L, and the frequency distribution of urinary iodine was: <100 μg/L, 10%, 100-199 μg/L, 51%, 200-299 μg/L was 34.5%, ≥300μg/L was 4.5%; the goiter rate was 4.5%. Conclusion The iodine nutritional status of adolescents (12-17 years old) in Gaoming District is generally appropriate, and the median is higher than the appropriate level.

title: 探讨盆腔解剖学教学中联合妇产科临床教学的优势
abstract: 目的探讨盆腔解剖学教学中联合妇产科临床教学的优势,为提高临床教学效果提供参考。方法该校级选择2010年五年制医学专业学生实施以疾病为基础的教学,选择32名学生,在课期,对32名学生进行无记名式问卷调查(主要了解学生的学习兴趣、记忆、知识的了解程度、学习效率、对临床实习的了解、学习热情以及理解程度等方面),最后对问卷进行统计分析,观察教学效果。结果问卷调查总共发放32份,共回收32份,回收率100%。与旧的教学方法相比,新教学方法明显提高了学生对解剖学的兴趣,使得同学们记忆更加清楚,两者相比差异具有统计学意义(P<0.05)。结论盆腔解剖学教学中联合妇产科临床教学可以提高学生临床学习的兴趣和记忆,提高教学质量,节约教学时间,值得向其他学科推广使用。但是该种方法在未来的实施过程中将会面临一定的困难,需要进一步的观察和研究。
text: 探讨盆腔解剖学教学中联合妇产科临床教学的优势 目的探讨盆腔解剖学教学中联合妇产科临床教学的优势为提高临床教学效果提供参考。方法该校级选择2010年五年制医学专业学生实施以疾病为基础的教学选择32名学生在课期对32名学生进行无记名式问卷调查主要了解学生的学习兴趣、记忆、知识的了解程度、学习效率、对临床实习的了解、学习热情以及理解程度等方面最后对问卷进行统计分析观察教学效果。结果问卷调查总共发放32份共回收32份回收率100。与旧的教学方法相比新教学方法明显提高了学生对解剖学的兴趣使得同学们记忆更加清楚两者相比差异具有统计学意义p005。结论盆腔解剖学教学中联合妇产科临床教学可以提高学生临床学习的兴趣和记忆提高教学质量节约教学时间值得向其他学科推广使用。但是该种方法在未来的实施过程中将会面临一定的困难需要进一步的观察和研究。
en_title: To explore the advantages of combined clinical teaching of obstetrics and gynecology in the teaching of pelvic anatomy
en_abstract: Objective To explore the advantages of combining the clinical teaching of obstetrics and gynecology in the teaching of pelvic anatomy, and to provide reference for improving the effect of clinical teaching. Methods The school selected five-year medical students in 2010 to implement disease-based teaching, selected 32 students, and conducted an anonymous questionnaire survey on 32 students during the course period (mainly to understand students' interest in learning, memory, knowledge, etc.). The degree of understanding, learning efficiency, understanding of clinical practice, enthusiasm for learning and understanding, etc.), and finally the questionnaire was statistically analyzed to observe the teaching effect. Results A total of 32 questionnaires were distributed and 32 were recovered, with a recovery rate of 100%. Compared with the old teaching method, the new teaching method significantly improved the students' interest in anatomy and made the students' memory more clearly, and the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05). Conclusion Combined with clinical teaching of obstetrics and gynecology in pelvic anatomy teaching can improve students' interest and memory in clinical learning, improve teaching quality, save teaching time, and it is worthy of promotion and use in other disciplines. However, this method will face certain difficulties in the future implementation process, and further observation and research are needed.

title: 改进的无功功率模型参考自适应异步电机转速辨识
abstract: 针对传统无功功率模型参考自适应模型的输入信号中含有大量的高频信号和噪声,致使模型的自适应机构设计难度增加、速度预测精确度降低的问题,提出改进的基于无功功率的模型参考自适应系统。在传统的无功功率模型参考自适应模型的基础上,引入巴特沃思滤波器并运用改进的模糊PI控制器取代原有的控制器,滤除了输入信号的噪声,提高转速预测精确度。仿真结果表明,改进后的无功功率模型参考自适应系统,参考模型输出的无功功率信号较滤波前其振动的幅值和频率大幅度降低,将这种信号作为自适应模块的输入得到的预测转速,其预测精确度和预测系统动态性能得到提高显著。
text: 改进的无功功率模型参考自适应异步电机转速辨识 针对传统无功功率模型参考自适应模型的输入信号中含有大量的高频信号和噪声致使模型的自适应机构设计难度增加、速度预测精确度降低的问题提出改进的基于无功功率的模型参考自适应系统。在传统的无功功率模型参考自适应模型的基础上引入巴特沃思滤波器并运用改进的模糊pi控制器取代原有的控制器滤除了输入信号的噪声提高转速预测精确度。仿真结果表明改进后的无功功率模型参考自适应系统参考模型输出的无功功率信号较滤波前其振动的幅值和频率大幅度降低将这种信号作为自适应模块的输入得到的预测转速其预测精确度和预测系统动态性能得到提高显著。
en_title: Improved Reactive Power Model Reference Adaptive Induction Motor Speed Identification
en_abstract: Aiming at the problems that the input signal of the reference adaptive model of the traditional reactive power model contains a large number of high-frequency signals and noise, which increases the difficulty of designing the adaptive mechanism of the model and reduces the accuracy of speed prediction, an improved model based on reactive power is proposed. See Adaptive Systems. On the basis of the traditional reactive power model reference adaptive model, a Butterworth filter is introduced and an improved fuzzy PI controller is used to replace the original controller, which filters out the noise of the input signal and improves the accuracy of speed prediction. The simulation results show that the improved reactive power model refers to the adaptive system, and the reactive power signal output by the reference model is significantly lower than the amplitude and frequency of the vibration before filtering, and this signal is used as the input of the adaptive module. The prediction accuracy and dynamic performance of the prediction system are improved significantly.

title: 日本战后技术引进到自主创新过渡的社会条件分析
abstract:
技术引进到自主创新是很多国家必须经历的一个阶段,中国也不例外。中国现如今正处在一个从国外吸引先进技术、招商引资到研发新技术、拥有自主知识产权的过渡阶段。日本是公认20世纪发展最快的国家,仅用20-30年的时间走完了资本主义200多年走完的路,堪称发展史上的一个奇迹,而日本成功实现从技术引进向技术创新过渡是创造这一奇迹的重要原因之一。那么,日本成功实现从技术引进向技术创新过渡经历了哪些阶段?各阶段具有什么特征?成功实现过渡是在什么样的社会条件下完成的?日本的成功经验对于中国走自主创新之路有何启示?回答这些问题是本文研究的目标。
本文基于国内外大量关于在战后日本发展奇迹的相关成果,综合运用文献分析法和概念分析方法,从STS的交叉学科视角,首先从历时态维度分析了日本战后技术引进到自主创新演进的阶段特征,将其划分为前后两大阶段,每个大阶段又再各分为两小阶段。两个大阶段是：战后日本技术的引进阶段和战后日本技术的创新阶段。前者又划分为“日本战后经济恢复期--科技转型和日本战后经济高速发展期--技术效仿转型；后者则分为日本战后经济奇迹期--二次创新期和日本战后经济稳定增长期--自主创新期。论文从技术特征和社会条件两个方面分别讨论了每个阶段具体特征。其次,基于社会条件对科学技术具有反作用的理论立场出发,从共时态上分析了日本实现经济奇迹所必须的社会条件,即经济条件是基础条件,政治条件是主导条件,教育条件是主体条件,文化条件则是整合条件。最后,论文还阐明了日本战后技术引进到自主创新演进的特殊意义及作用,概括了日本的经验与不足,提出了对我国现阶段实现自主创新的有益的建议。
基于上述讨论,本文提出,日本战后从技术引进到自主创新这个时期,其当时的经济条件、政治条件、教育条件和文化条件等社会因素是实现这一过渡的重要原因。因此,技术引进和自主创新必须与国家与地区的社会条件相契合；技术引进和自主创新必须与社会条件的时代演进相适应；技术引进和自主创新模式的借鉴不可“悬置”社会条件分析。
加快社会变革,培育良好的社会环境条件,对于正在倡导走自主创新之路的中国具有重要的现实意义,本研究也有助于丰富STS的研究。
text: 日本战后技术引进到自主创新过渡的社会条件分析 技术引进到自主创新是很多国家必须经历的一个阶段中国也不例外。中国现如今正处在一个从国外吸引先进技术、招商引资到研发新技术、拥有自主知识产权的过渡阶段。日本是公认20世纪发展最快的国家仅用2030年的时间走完了资本主义200多年走完的路堪称发展史上的一个奇迹而日本成功实现从技术引进向技术创新过渡是创造这一奇迹的重要原因之一。那么日本成功实现从技术引进向技术创新过渡经历了哪些阶段各阶段具有什么特征成功实现过渡是在什么样的社会条件下完成的日本的成功经验对于中国走自主创新之路有何启示回答这些问题是本文研究的目标。 本文基于国内外大量关于在战后日本发展奇迹的相关成果综合运用文献分析法和概念分析方法从sts的交叉学科视角首先从历时态维度分析了日本战后技术引进到自主创新演进的阶段特征将其划分为前后两大阶段每个大阶段又再各分为两小阶段。两个大阶段是：战后日本技术的引进阶段和战后日本技术的创新阶段。前者又划分为“日本战后经济恢复期科技转型和日本战后经济高速发展期技术效仿转型；后者则分为日本战后经济奇迹期二次创新期和日本战后经济稳定增长期自主创新期。论文从技术特征和社会条件两个方面分别讨论了每个阶段具体特征。其次基于社会条件对科学技术具有反作用的理论立场出发从共时态上分析了日本实现经济奇迹所必须的社会条件即经济条件是基础条件政治条件是主导条件教育条件是主体条件文化条件则是整合条件。最后论文还阐明了日本战后技术引进到自主创新演进的特殊意义及作用概括了日本的经验与不足提出了对我国现阶段实现自主创新的有益的建议。 基于上述讨论本文提出日本战后从技术引进到自主创新这个时期其当时的经济条件、政治条件、教育条件和文化条件等社会因素是实现这一过渡的重要原因。因此技术引进和自主创新必须与国家与地区的社会条件相契合；技术引进和自主创新必须与社会条件的时代演进相适应；技术引进和自主创新模式的借鉴不可“悬置”社会条件分析。 加快社会变革培育良好的社会环境条件对于正在倡导走自主创新之路的中国具有重要的现实意义本研究也有助于丰富sts的研究。
en_title: An analysis of the social conditions of the transition from technology introduction to independent innovation in Japan after the war
en_abstract:
The introduction of technology to independent innovation is a stage that many countries must go through, and China is no exception. China is now in a transitional stage from attracting advanced technology and investment from abroad to developing new technologies and possessing independent intellectual property rights. Japan is recognized as the fastest growing country in the 20th century. It only took 20-30 years to complete the road that capitalism has completed in more than 200 years. It can be called a miracle in the history of development. Japan's successful transition from technology introduction to technological innovation is the One of the important reasons for this miracle. Then, what stages did Japan go through to successfully realize the transition from technology introduction to technological innovation? What are the characteristics of each stage? What kind of social conditions did the successful transition take? Implications? Answering these questions is the goal of this study.
Based on a large number of domestic and foreign related achievements on the development miracle of Japan in the postwar period, this paper comprehensively uses the literature analysis method and conceptual analysis method, from the interdisciplinary perspective of STS, and firstly analyzes the evolution of Japan's postwar technology introduction to independent innovation from the diachronic dimension. According to the characteristics of the stages, it is divided into two major stages before and after, and each major stage is further divided into two small stages. The two major stages are: the introduction stage of post-war Japanese technology and the innovation stage of post-war Japanese technology. The former is divided into "Japan's post-war economic recovery period--scientific and technological transformation and Japan's post-war high-speed economic development period--technological imitation and transformation; the latter is divided into Japan's post-war economic miracle period--second innovation period and Japan's post-war period. The period of stable economic growth - the period of independent innovation. The paper discusses the specific characteristics of each stage from the aspects of technical characteristics and social conditions. Secondly, based on the theoretical standpoint that social conditions have an adverse effect on science and technology, it analyzes from the synchronic tense The social conditions necessary for Japan to realize the economic miracle, namely, the economic conditions are the basic conditions, the political conditions are the dominant conditions, the educational conditions are the main conditions, and the cultural conditions are the integration conditions.Finally, the thesis also clarifies that the introduction of post-war technology into the autonomous The special significance and function of innovation evolution summarizes Japan's experience and deficiencies, and puts forward useful suggestions for the realization of independent innovation in my country at this stage.
Based on the above discussion, this paper proposes that the economic conditions, political conditions, educational conditions, cultural conditions and other social factors are the important reasons for the transition from technology introduction to independent innovation in Japan after the war. Therefore, technology introduction and independent innovation must be in line with the social conditions of the country and region; technology introduction and independent innovation must be adapted to the evolution of the social conditions; the reference of technology introduction and independent innovation mode cannot "suspend" the analysis of social conditions.
Accelerating social reform and cultivating favorable social environment have important practical significance for China, which is advocating the road of independent innovation, and this research will also help enrich the research of STS.

title: 灌溉作用下黄土宏观力学响应及微观结构特性研究
abstract: 从黄土特有的水敏性和微结构角度出发,开展灌溉作用下,水体入渗过程中黄土宏观力学响应与微观结构特性之间变化规律的研究。设定了不同含水量下的黄土宏观力学与微观结构试验,旨在得到水对黄土的应力应变响应规律及试验前后剪裂面上黄土微观结构的变化特征。结果表明:研究区Q_3黄土的应力-应变曲线随着围压的增大呈现出由应变软化型向应变硬化型转变,随着含水量的增大呈现出由应变硬化型向应变软化型转变的规律;并以此确定了研究区黄土结构屈服应力sigma_k所对应的应变值一般小于2%;结合饱和Q_3黄土三轴固结不排水剪切试验获得了研究区黄土的稳态线参数及状态边界面参数,并在假设不同围压条件下稳定状态收敛的前提下,得到近似状态临界面公式;分析了Q_3黄土在不同围压和含水量下的破坏模式,其特征表现在黄土试样剪切前后的微观结构变化主要表现在微结构类型的转变、孔隙含量减小及微裂隙的发育程度上。
text: 灌溉作用下黄土宏观力学响应及微观结构特性研究 从黄土特有的水敏性和微结构角度出发开展灌溉作用下水体入渗过程中黄土宏观力学响应与微观结构特性之间变化规律的研究。设定了不同含水量下的黄土宏观力学与微观结构试验旨在得到水对黄土的应力应变响应规律及试验前后剪裂面上黄土微观结构的变化特征。结果表明研究区q3黄土的应力应变曲线随着围压的增大呈现出由应变软化型向应变硬化型转变随着含水量的增大呈现出由应变硬化型向应变软化型转变的规律并以此确定了研究区黄土结构屈服应力sigmak所对应的应变值一般小于2结合饱和q3黄土三轴固结不排水剪切试验获得了研究区黄土的稳态线参数及状态边界面参数并在假设不同围压条件下稳定状态收敛的前提下得到近似状态临界面公式分析了q3黄土在不同围压和含水量下的破坏模式其特征表现在黄土试样剪切前后的微观结构变化主要表现在微结构类型的转变、孔隙含量减小及微裂隙的发育程度上。
en_title: Study on Macromechanical Response and Microstructural Properties of Loess Under Irrigation
en_abstract: From the perspective of the unique water sensitivity and microstructure of loess, the study on the change law between macromechanical response and microstructure characteristics of loess during water infiltration under irrigation was carried out. The macro-mechanics and micro-structure tests of loess under different water contents were set up to obtain the stress-strain response law of water to loess and the variation characteristics of loess microstructure on the shear plane before and after the test. The results show that the stress-strain curve of Q_3 loess in the study area changes from strain-softening type to strain-hardening type with the increase of confining pressure, and from strain-hardening type to strain-softening type with the increase of water content. Then it is determined that the strain value corresponding to the yield stress sigma_k of the loess structure in the study area is generally less than 2%; combined with the triaxial consolidation undrained shear test of saturated Q_3 loess, the steady-state line parameters and state edges of the loess in the study area are obtained. On the premise that the stable state converges under different confining pressures, the approximate state critical surface formula is obtained; the failure modes of Q_3 loess under different confining pressures and water contents are analyzed, which is characterized by the shearing of loess samples. The microstructure changes before and after are mainly manifested in the transformation of microstructure types, the reduction of pore content and the development of microcracks.

title: 融资融券、信息传递对科创板股价波动的实证研究
abstract: 基于实证方法,研究了科创板融资融券交易对股价波动的影响作用。研究结果表明,科创板融资融券交易起到了缓解股价波动的作用,其影响机理是通过加快信息传递速度促使价格向均衡价值回归。区分正面信息和负面信息后,发现融资交易带来的正面信息传递速度上升会加剧股价波动,而融券交易带来的负面信息传递速度上升会减缓股价波动。基于此,科创板应当进一步释放融资融券余量,提升融券交易比重,促进融资融券业务平衡发展,并做好投资者教育。
text: 融资融券、信息传递对科创板股价波动的实证研究 基于实证方法研究了科创板融资融券交易对股价波动的影响作用。研究结果表明科创板融资融券交易起到了缓解股价波动的作用其影响机理是通过加快信息传递速度促使价格向均衡价值回归。区分正面信息和负面信息后发现融资交易带来的正面信息传递速度上升会加剧股价波动而融券交易带来的负面信息传递速度上升会减缓股价波动。基于此科创板应当进一步释放融资融券余量提升融券交易比重促进融资融券业务平衡发展并做好投资者教育。
en_title: An empirical study of margin financing and securities lending and information transfer on the stock price volatility of the Science and Technology Innovation Board
en_abstract: Based on the empirical method, this paper studies the impact of margin financing and securities lending on the Science and Technology Innovation Board on stock price volatility. The research results show that the financing and securities lending transactions on the Science and Technology Innovation Board play a role in alleviating the fluctuation of stock prices, and its impact mechanism is to promote the return of prices to the equilibrium value by accelerating the speed of information transmission. After distinguishing between positive information and negative information, it is found that the increase in the transmission speed of positive information brought by financing transactions will aggravate stock price volatility, while the increase in the transmission speed of negative information brought about by securities lending transactions will slow down stock price fluctuations. Based on this, the Science and Technology Innovation Board should further release the margin of margin financing and securities lending, increase the proportion of securities lending transactions, promote the balanced development of margin financing and securities lending business, and do a good job in investor education.

title: 长期施肥对不同粒级组分土壤微生物量碳氮的影响
abstract: 土壤微生物作为土壤肥力的重要组成部分,其生物体含量会受到不同施肥措施的影响而有所差异,从而影响土壤肥力。本研究以贵州黄壤长期定位施肥试验为依托,选取不施肥(CK)、单施化肥(NPK)、单施有机肥(M)和常量有机无机肥配施(MNPK)4个处理,运用氯仿熏蒸-K_2SO_4提取法对全土、粗颗粒、微团聚体和黏粉粒4个组分的土壤微生物生物量碳氮分布特征进行研究。结果表明:长期施用化肥(NPK)和有机肥(M和MNPK)均能增加各组分土壤微生物量碳(SMBC)和土壤微生物量氮(SMBN)含量,且基本随粒级的减小而降低。较CK处理,有机肥处理(M和MNPK)使所有组分SMBC含量显著增加,以粗颗粒组分增幅最大,SMBN含量仅在全土和粗颗粒组分中表现出显著差异。与CK处理相比,全土微生物熵(qMB)、微生物量氮占比(SMBN/TN)分别在MNPK处理和M处理下达显著差异,同时qMB随粒级的减小而减小,微生物量碳氮比(SMBC/SMBN)在各施肥处理中差异较大(NPK<M<CK<MNPK)。团聚体组分qMB在有机肥处理下的效果好于化肥处理,而SMBN/TN在化肥处理下的效果好于有机肥。全土SMBC和SMBN分别与其qMB和SMBN/TN达显著正相关,粗颗粒和微团聚体组分的微生物量碳氮含量与全土微生物量碳氮含量有显著的相关性,说明长期施用有机肥可有效增加土壤微生物量碳氮含量,且随粒级的减小而减小,其中以粗颗粒组分变化最敏感。
text: 长期施肥对不同粒级组分土壤微生物量碳氮的影响 土壤微生物作为土壤肥力的重要组成部分其生物体含量会受到不同施肥措施的影响而有所差异从而影响土壤肥力。本研究以贵州黄壤长期定位施肥试验为依托选取不施肥ck、单施化肥npk、单施有机肥m和常量有机无机肥配施mnpk4个处理运用氯仿熏蒸k2so4提取法对全土、粗颗粒、微团聚体和黏粉粒4个组分的土壤微生物生物量碳氮分布特征进行研究。结果表明长期施用化肥npk和有机肥m和mnpk均能增加各组分土壤微生物量碳smbc和土壤微生物量氮smbn含量且基本随粒级的减小而降低。较ck处理有机肥处理m和mnpk使所有组分smbc含量显著增加以粗颗粒组分增幅最大smbn含量仅在全土和粗颗粒组分中表现出显著差异。与ck处理相比全土微生物熵qmb、微生物量氮占比smbntn分别在mnpk处理和m处理下达显著差异同时qmb随粒级的减小而减小微生物量碳氮比smbcsmbn在各施肥处理中差异较大npkmckmnpk。团聚体组分qmb在有机肥处理下的效果好于化肥处理而smbntn在化肥处理下的效果好于有机肥。全土smbc和smbn分别与其qmb和smbntn达显著正相关粗颗粒和微团聚体组分的微生物量碳氮含量与全土微生物量碳氮含量有显著的相关性说明长期施用有机肥可有效增加土壤微生物量碳氮含量且随粒级的减小而减小其中以粗颗粒组分变化最敏感。
en_title: Effects of long-term fertilization on soil microbial biomass carbon and nitrogen with different granular components
en_abstract: Soil microorganisms are an important part of soil fertility, and their biomass content will be affected by different fertilization measures, which will affect soil fertility. In this study, based on the long-term positioning fertilization experiment of Guizhou yellow soil, four treatments were selected: no fertilization (CK), single application of chemical fertilizer (NPK), single application of organic fertilizer (M) and combined application of constant organic and inorganic fertilizer (MNPK), using chloroform fumigation. -K_2SO_4 extraction method was used to study the carbon and nitrogen distribution characteristics of soil microbial biomass in four components: whole soil, coarse particles, microaggregates and clay silt particles. The results showed that long-term application of chemical fertilizers (NPK) and organic fertilizers (M and MNPK) could increase the contents of soil microbial biomass carbon (SMBC) and soil microbial biomass nitrogen (SMBN) in each component, and they basically decreased with the decrease of grain size. . Compared with the CK treatment, the organic fertilizer treatments (M and MNPK) significantly increased the SMBC content of all the components, with the largest increase in the coarse-grained component, and the SMBN content only showed a significant difference in the whole soil and the coarse-grained component. Compared with the CK treatment, the total soil microbial entropy (qMB) and the proportion of microbial biomass nitrogen (SMBN/TN) were significantly different under the MNPK treatment and M treatment, respectively. The ratio (SMBC/SMBN) was significantly different among the fertilization treatments (NPK<M<CK<MNPK). The effect of the aggregate fraction qMB under the treatment of organic fertilizer was better than that under the treatment of chemical fertilizer, while the effect of SMBN/TN under the treatment of chemical fertilizer was better than that under the treatment of organic fertilizer. The total soil SMBC and SMBN were significantly positively correlated with their qMB and SMBN/TN, respectively, and the microbial biomass carbon and nitrogen content of the coarse particles and microaggregates had a significant correlation with the total soil microbial biomass carbon and nitrogen content, indicating that long-term application of organic fertilizers can effectively The content of carbon and nitrogen in soil microbial biomass increased, and decreased with the decrease of particle size, among which the coarse particle component was the most sensitive.

title: 青海湖流域及周边地区浅层地温对全球变化的响应
abstract: 利用青海湖流域及周边8个气象站1961—2007年的0~20 cm浅层地温资料,采用气候倾向率等气候统计学分析方法,对青海湖流域及周边地区近47 a来年、季平均地温的变化趋势及气候突变进行了研究。结果表明,区域内0 cm、5 cm、10 cm、15 cm和20 cm浅层地温均呈现升高的趋势,升幅分别为0.30~0.60℃·(10a)~(-1)、0.22~0.51℃·(10a)~(-1)、0.28~0.58℃·(10a)~(-1)、0.30~0.59℃·(10a)~(-1)和0.32~0.59℃·(10a)~(-1);近47 a来四季平均浅层地温整体均呈现升高趋势,升幅为0.35~0.52℃·(10a)~(-1),以冬季升幅最小,春季和夏季升幅最大,平均浅层地温升温幅度有增大的趋势;绝大部分站点的年、季平均浅层地温均呈现显著的升高趋势,升幅接近甚至高于同时期的平均气温增温幅度;年平均浅层地温除都兰站在20世纪60—80年代呈现出波动性的升高趋势以外,其他各站点均呈逐年代升高的趋势,20世纪60和70年代的平均浅层地温明显偏低,80年代相对正常,90年代偏高,进入21世纪初后,各站的平均浅层地温均偏高0.6℃以上;天峻、都兰和海晏的年、季平均地温均没有发生突变,其他各站浅层年、季平均地温的突变时间绝大部分站点都发生在El Nino年或La Nina年,说明青海湖流域及周边地区浅层地温的变化受ENSO事件的影响比较明显。
text: 青海湖流域及周边地区浅层地温对全球变化的响应 利用青海湖流域及周边8个气象站1961—2007年的020 cm浅层地温资料采用气候倾向率等气候统计学分析方法对青海湖流域及周边地区近47 a来年、季平均地温的变化趋势及气候突变进行了研究。结果表明区域内0 cm、5 cm、10 cm、15 cm和20 cm浅层地温均呈现升高的趋势升幅分别为030060℃·10a1、022051℃·10a1、028058℃·10a1、030059℃·10a1和032059℃·10a1近47 a来四季平均浅层地温整体均呈现升高趋势升幅为035052℃·10a1以冬季升幅最小春季和夏季升幅最大平均浅层地温升温幅度有增大的趋势绝大部分站点的年、季平均浅层地温均呈现显著的升高趋势升幅接近甚至高于同时期的平均气温增温幅度年平均浅层地温除都兰站在20世纪60—80年代呈现出波动性的升高趋势以外其他各站点均呈逐年代升高的趋势20世纪60和70年代的平均浅层地温明显偏低80年代相对正常90年代偏高进入21世纪初后各站的平均浅层地温均偏高06℃以上天峻、都兰和海晏的年、季平均地温均没有发生突变其他各站浅层年、季平均地温的突变时间绝大部分站点都发生在el nino年或la nina年说明青海湖流域及周边地区浅层地温的变化受enso事件的影响比较明显。
en_title: Responses of shallow ground temperature to global changes in the Qinghai Lake Basin and its surrounding areas
en_abstract: Using the 0-20 cm shallow ground temperature data from 1961 to 2007 from 8 meteorological stations in the Qinghai Lake Basin and its surrounding areas, and using climatic statistical analysis methods such as climatic trend rate, the mean ground temperature of the past 47 years in the Qinghai Lake Basin and its surrounding areas was analyzed for the past 47 years. The change trend and climate abrupt change were studied. The results show that the 0 cm, 5 cm, 10 cm, 15 cm and 20 cm shallow ground temperatures in the area all show an increasing trend, with an increase of 0.30~0.60℃·(10a)~(-1), 0.22~0.51℃, respectively. ·(10a)~(-1), 0.28~0.58℃ ·(10a)~(-1), 0.30~0.59℃ ·(10a)~(-1) and 0.32~0.59℃ ·(10a)~(-1 ); in the past 47 years, the average shallow ground temperature in the four seasons has shown an overall upward trend, with an increase of 0.35~0.52℃·(10a)~(-1), with the smallest increase in winter, the largest increase in spring and summer, and the average shallow ground temperature warming There is an increasing trend in the amplitude; the annual and quarterly average shallow ground temperatures of most stations show a significant upward trend, and the increase is close to or even higher than the average temperature increase in the same period; the annual average shallow ground temperature except for the Dulan station In addition to the increasing trend of volatility in the 1960s and 1980s, all other stations showed an increasing trend year by year. The average shallow ground temperature in the 1960s and 1970s was obviously low, and in the 1980s, it was relatively normal, and in the 1990s. The age is relatively high. After entering the early 21st century, the average shallow ground temperature of each station was higher than 0.6℃; the annual and seasonal average ground temperature of Tianjun, Dulan and Haiyan did not change abruptly. The abrupt changes of the seasonal mean ground temperature occurred at most stations in El Nino or La Nina years, indicating that the changes of shallow ground temperature in the Qinghai Lake Basin and its surrounding areas were significantly affected by ENSO events.

title: 高职院校体育教学中如何培养学生的团队合作精神
abstract: 随着我国体育事业的不断发展,高职院校体育教学越来越被人们所重视。体育教学作为培养学生团队合作意识的重要学科,能够有效促进学生养成良好的团队合作意识,促进学生综合素质的有效提高,为学生今后的发展奠定良好的基础条件。本文就高职体育教学中如何培养学生的团队合作精神作出相应分析。
text: 高职院校体育教学中如何培养学生的团队合作精神 随着我国体育事业的不断发展高职院校体育教学越来越被人们所重视。体育教学作为培养学生团队合作意识的重要学科能够有效促进学生养成良好的团队合作意识促进学生综合素质的有效提高为学生今后的发展奠定良好的基础条件。本文就高职体育教学中如何培养学生的团队合作精神作出相应分析。
en_title: How to Cultivate Students' Teamwork Spirit in Physical Education in Higher Vocational Colleges
en_abstract: With the continuous development of sports in our country, more and more attention has been paid to physical education in higher vocational colleges. As an important subject to cultivate students' sense of teamwork, physical education can effectively promote students to develop a good sense of teamwork, promote the effective improvement of students' comprehensive quality, and lay a good foundation for students' future development. This article makes a corresponding analysis on how to cultivate students' teamwork spirit in higher vocational physical education teaching.

title: 坚持施工图审查制度  维护公共利益  保障公众安全
abstract: <正>住房和城乡建设部令第13号《房屋建筑和市政基础设施施工图设计文件审查管理办法》发布已一年有余,笔者认为有必要让社会各界进一步认识我国设立施工图审查制度的背景、意义和作用,以及施工图审查工作的性质、职责等,以便得到社会各界更广泛的支持,推动我国施工图审查制度的不断完善,适应党的十八届三中全会全面深化改革的需要,适应政府简

en_title: Adhere to the construction drawing review system, safeguard public interests, and ensure public safety
en_abstract: <正>It has been more than a year since the issuance of the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development Order No. 13 "Administrative Measures for the Review of Construction Drawings and Design Documents of Housing Construction and Municipal Infrastructure". The author believes that it is necessary for all sectors of society to further understand the background of my country's establishment of the construction drawing review system , significance and role, as well as the nature and responsibilities of construction drawing review work, in order to obtain wider support from all walks of life, promote the continuous improvement of my country's construction drawing review system, and meet the needs of the Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee to comprehensively deepen the reform, Adapt to government briefs

title: 施耐德电气:以数字化创新护航能效管理高质量发展
abstract: <正>停电时间减少一半以上,工厂效率提高超过四分之一,节省能源的损耗近三分之一,客户的满意度提高近三分之一,是施耐德电气最终想助力用户通过数字化转型实现的价值。6月4～6日,全球能效管理与自动化领域数字化转型专家施耐德电气在厦门国际会展中心举办了以"共创共赢·数字化未来"为主题的2019施耐德电气创新峰会。这场备受关注的创新峰会吸引了近三千位行业意见领袖、客户、生态合作伙伴、行业专家参与其中。
text: 施耐德电气以数字化创新护航能效管理高质量发展 正停电时间减少一半以上工厂效率提高超过四分之一节省能源的损耗近三分之一客户的满意度提高近三分之一是施耐德电气最终想助力用户通过数字化转型实现的价值。6月4～6日全球能效管理与自动化领域数字化转型专家施耐德电气在厦门国际会展中心举办了以共创共赢·数字化未来为主题的2019施耐德电气创新峰会。这场备受关注的创新峰会吸引了近三千位行业意见领袖、客户、生态合作伙伴、行业专家参与其中。
en_title: Schneider Electric: Escorting high-quality development of energy efficiency management with digital innovation
en_abstract: <Positive> The power outage time has been reduced by more than half, the factory efficiency has been increased by more than a quarter, the energy loss has been saved by nearly one-third, and customer satisfaction has been increased by nearly one-third. Schneider Electric ultimately wants to help users achieve digital transformation. the value of.
