en_title: Analysis and research on economic management means of total emission reduction of major pollutants in Xi'an
en_abstract:
The total emission reduction of major pollutants is an effective means to achieve environmental protection. During the “Eleventh Five-Year Plan” period in my country, it is clearly required that by the end of the “Eleventh Five-Year Plan”, the total emissions of major pollutants such as sulfur dioxide and chemical oxygen demand in the country must be in 2008. On an annual basis, it will be reduced by 10%, and the energy consumption per ten thousand yuan of GDP will be reduced by 20%. The total pollutant emission reduction work in Xi'an has entered its fifth year from start to development. In the past four years, Xi'an City has conscientiously implemented the national guidelines and policies, recognized that leaders have paid attention to it, and scientifically formulated emission reduction plans. Through the implementation of three emission reduction measures of structure, engineering and management, the emission reduction work in Xi'an has achieved staged results. The environmental quality of Xi'an has been significantly improved, and the emission reduction task assigned by the provincial government has been exceeded for three consecutive years. While affirming the achievements, the existing problems cannot be ignored. In 2010, the situation of emission reduction is relatively severe, and the in-depth development of emission reduction has encountered a bottleneck, and the potential of emission reduction needs to be further explored.
This paper attempts to explore how to effectively implement pollution reduction through economic means combined with management methods. Attempts to explore an economic management model with the coordinated development of the government-led and market-regulated coupling system. The so-called economic means is the emissions trading system. The emission trading system has been implemented in some provinces and cities in our country, and it has obvious effect on pollution reduction. Since the potential trading market is gradually being formed and the regulatory conditions are initially established, it is feasible for Xi'an to implement the emission trading system. If the three major measures of government directives and emission trading can be played at the same time, and a complementary mechanism can be formed for coordinated development, it will be of great help and guiding significance for the pollution reduction work in Xi'an.
This paper introduces in detail the development of my country's emission trading system and the practice at home and abroad. And the status quo of pollution reduction work in Xi'an, and in view of the existing problems, carry out fault diagnosis of pollution reduction work in Xi'an. And put forward a new research idea, which is a new model of pollution reduction management from the main means of administrative intervention to the coordinated development of government-led and market-regulated coupled systems.

title: 改良U字缝合止血法应用于前置胎盘剖宫产术中效果分析
abstract: 目的探讨改良U字缝合止血法对前置胎盘剖宫产术中出血的止血效果,为实际应用提供参考依据。方法 80例前置胎盘剖宫产患者,随机分为对照组和研究组,每组40例。两组均予以缩宫素、卡前列素氨丁三醇,对照组采用8字缝合止血法,研究组采用改良U字缝合术。比较两组患者手术时间、术中出血量、止血时间、输红细胞悬液剂量、止血效果及术后并发症发生情况。结果研究组患者手术时间为(65.15±3.30)min、术中出血量为(927.13±60.35)ml、止血时间为(12.12±2.03)min、输红细胞悬液剂量为(0.92±0.20)U,均优于对照组的(83.17±5.42)min、(1183.15±70.23)ml、(20.18±4.16)min、(2.27±0.51)U,差异具有统计学意义(P<0.05)。研究组止血有效率为97.5%,高于对照组的75.0%,差异具有统计学意义(P<0.05)。研究组患者术后并发症发生率为7.5%,低于对照组的27.5%,差异具有统计学意义(P<0.05)。结论改良U字缝合止血法用于前置胎盘剖宫产术中可实现更快速、稳定止血效果,有利于改善其临床表现及预后质量,值得临床推广使用。
text: 改良u字缝合止血法应用于前置胎盘剖宫产术中效果分析 目的探讨改良u字缝合止血法对前置胎盘剖宫产术中出血的止血效果为实际应用提供参考依据。方法 80例前置胎盘剖宫产患者随机分为对照组和研究组每组40例。两组均予以缩宫素、卡前列素氨丁三醇对照组采用8字缝合止血法研究组采用改良u字缝合术。比较两组患者手术时间、术中出血量、止血时间、输红细胞悬液剂量、止血效果及术后并发症发生情况。结果研究组患者手术时间为6515±330min、术中出血量为92713±6035ml、止血时间为1212±203min、输红细胞悬液剂量为092±020u均优于对照组的8317±542min、118315±7023ml、2018±416min、227±051u差异具有统计学意义p005。研究组止血有效率为975高于对照组的750差异具有统计学意义p005。研究组患者术后并发症发生率为75低于对照组的275差异具有统计学意义p005。结论改良u字缝合止血法用于前置胎盘剖宫产术中可实现更快速、稳定止血效果有利于改善其临床表现及预后质量值得临床推广使用。
en_title: Effect analysis of modified U-shaped suture hemostasis method in placenta previa cesarean section
en_abstract: Objective To investigate the hemostatic effect of the modified U-shaped suture method for bleeding during cesarean section with placenta previa, and to provide reference for practical application. Methods 80 patients with placenta previa cesarean section were randomly divided into control group and study group, 40 cases in each group. Both groups were treated with oxytocin and carboprost tromethamine, the control group was treated with 8-shaped suture for hemostasis, and the study group was treated with modified U-shaped suture. The operation time, intraoperative blood loss, hemostasis time, red blood cell suspension dose, hemostatic effect and postoperative complications were compared between the two groups. Results The operation time of the study group was (65.15±3.30) min, the intraoperative blood loss was (927.13±60.35) ml, the hemostasis time was (12.12±2.03) min, and the red blood cell suspension dose was (0.92±0.20) U. Compared with the control group (83.17±5.42) min, (1183.15±70.23) ml, (20.18±4.16) min, (2.27±0.51) U, the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05). The effective rate of hemostasis in the study group was 97.5%, which was higher than 75.0% in the control group, and the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05). The incidence of postoperative complications in the study group was 7.5%, which was lower than 27.5% in the control group, and the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05). Conclusion The improved U-shaped suture hemostasis method for cesarean section with placenta previa can achieve a more rapid and stable hemostasis effect, which is beneficial to improve its clinical manifestations and prognosis quality, and is worthy of clinical promotion.

title: 3DGIS三维城市规划辅助决策支持系统子模块的设计与实现
abstract: 3DGIS三维城市规划辅助决策支持系统能规避平面规划的缺陷。决策者能在三维场景中,发现许多不易察觉的设计缺陷,将减少由于事先规划不周全而造成的无法挽回的损失与遗憾。介绍该系统子模块,着重介绍三维场景制作与管理模块、辅助规划分析与评审模块和规划成果输出模块的设计。
text: 3dgis三维城市规划辅助决策支持系统子模块的设计与实现 3dgis三维城市规划辅助决策支持系统能规避平面规划的缺陷。决策者能在三维场景中发现许多不易察觉的设计缺陷将减少由于事先规划不周全而造成的无法挽回的损失与遗憾。介绍该系统子模块着重介绍三维场景制作与管理模块、辅助规划分析与评审模块和规划成果输出模块的设计。
en_title: Design and Realization of Sub-modules of 3DGIS 3D Urban Planning Auxiliary Decision Support System
en_abstract: 3DGIS three-dimensional urban planning auxiliary decision support system can avoid the defects of plane planning. Decision makers can find many design defects that are not easily noticed in the 3D scene, which will reduce irreparable losses and regrets caused by inadequate planning in advance. The sub-modules of the system are introduced, and the design of the three-dimensional scene production and management module, the auxiliary planning analysis and evaluation module and the planning result output module are introduced.

title: 《文心雕龙·诏策》“命之为义,制姓（性）之本也”试辨
abstract: 《文心雕龙·诏策》：＂命之为义,制性之本也。＂关于＂性＂字的解释,文章采取归纳的方法。首先将结论加以悬置,转而讨论刘勰是如何得出此一结论的。通过刘勰得出此结论所可能依据的史料的归纳排比,从而论定当作＂制性之本＂,并进而指出此一说法实揭示了＂命＂此种文体前后变化的社会根源。
text: 《文心雕龙·诏策》“命之为义制姓（性）之本也”试辨 《文心雕龙·诏策》：＂命之为义制性之本也。＂关于＂性＂字的解释文章采取归纳的方法。首先将结论加以悬置转而讨论刘勰是如何得出此一结论的。通过刘勰得出此结论所可能依据的史料的归纳排比从而论定当作＂制性之本＂并进而指出此一说法实揭示了＂命＂此种文体前后变化的社会根源。
en_title: "Wen Xin Diao Long Zhao Ce", "Life is the righteousness, and the surname (nature) is also the foundation"
en_abstract: "Wen Xin Diao Long Zhao Ce": "Life is the righteousness, and the foundation of the system is also." Regarding the interpretation of the word "nature", the article adopts the method of induction. First, the conclusion is suspended, and then it is discussed how Liu Xie came to this conclusion. By summarizing and arranging the historical data on which Liu Xie's conclusion may be based, he concludes that it is "the foundation of the system", and further points out that this statement actually reveals the social origin of the changes in the style of "Ming".

title: 四面体核酸纳米材料促进皮肤缺损修复的体外、体内研究
abstract: 目的:探究四面体核酸纳米材料对皮肤缺损的修复过程是否存在促进作用,及其相关机制。材料与方法:1.四面体核酸纳米材料(简称四面体)的制备及鉴定:将组成四面体的四条单链置于TM buffer溶液中,进行退火程序。用TEM及Zeta电位检测确定成功制备出四面体。2. HaCaT(人永生化成纤维细胞)及HSF(人表皮成纤维细胞)对Cy5-四面体的摄取实验:Cy5-四面体及Cy5-单链DNA处理8h后,用共聚焦显微镜共定位检测细胞对Cy5-四面体及Cy5-单链的摄取能力。3.细胞增殖相关的研究:用CCK8实验检测四面体对细胞增殖的影响,流式细胞术检测四面体对细胞周期的影响。4.细胞划痕实验:在细胞划痕实验中,在0h、6h、24h对划痕面积进行记录,探究四面体对于上述两种细胞迁移能力的影响。5.炎症因子及分泌因子水平检测及其相关信号通路:运用Western blot及qPCR检测细胞内产生的炎症因子(TNF-α和IL-1β)的变化;采用ELISA试剂盒检测细胞释放的生长因子(VEGF和bFGF)水平的变化。通过Western blot检测AKT信号通路相关蛋白的变化水平。6.动物实验:取6只成年SD大鼠,麻醉备皮后用皮肤活检器于背部左右各取直径1cm圆形上皮全层组织。手术后每日注射0.1ml生理盐水或125nM四面体(溶于生理盐水)于左侧或右侧伤口周围皮下,按时间顺序拍照记录术区伤口变化。术后第14、21天取术区上皮组织送检。7.术区皮肤的组织学检测:将送检的皮肤组织处理后行HE染色、Masson染色及TNF-α、IL-1β的免疫荧光染色,并行相关分析。结果:在成功制备出符合标准的四面体后,共聚焦显微镜共定位发现,Cy5-四面体可以被Ha Ca T及HSF细胞大量摄取,而Cy5-单链不能进入细胞。CCK8实验发现125nM浓度四面体对两种细胞的增殖能力促进作用最强。流式细胞术检测证明,125nM四面体可以促进细胞周期进入G2-M期。细胞划痕实验表明,细胞在125nM四面体作用下,具有更强的迁移能力。此外,四面体可以上调AKT信号通路的表达,从而减少细胞内产生的炎症因子,并促进细胞释放生长因子。动物实验发现,四面体处理组皮肤伤口愈合速度明显加快,四面体可以促进上皮再生,同时减少术区TNF-α和IL-1β的产生,遗址术区纤维化程度,从而减轻瘢痕的产生。结论:四面体核酸纳米材料可以促进角质形成细胞和表皮成纤维细胞的增殖、迁移,并通过激活AKT信号通路,减少细胞炎症因子的产生,促进细胞生长因子的分泌。同时,四面体核酸纳米材料可以促进大鼠皮肤缺损的修复,促进术区再上皮化,抑制术区炎症反应及纤维化,减轻瘢痕产生。
text: 四面体核酸纳米材料促进皮肤缺损修复的体外、体内研究 目的探究四面体核酸纳米材料对皮肤缺损的修复过程是否存在促进作用及其相关机制。材料与方法1四面体核酸纳米材料简称四面体的制备及鉴定将组成四面体的四条单链置于tm buffer溶液中进行退火程序。用tem及zeta电位检测确定成功制备出四面体。2 hacat人永生化成纤维细胞及hsf人表皮成纤维细胞对cy5四面体的摄取实验cy5四面体及cy5单链dna处理8h后用共聚焦显微镜共定位检测细胞对cy5四面体及cy5单链的摄取能力。3细胞增殖相关的研究用cck8实验检测四面体对细胞增殖的影响流式细胞术检测四面体对细胞周期的影响。4细胞划痕实验在细胞划痕实验中在0h、6h、24h对划痕面积进行记录探究四面体对于上述两种细胞迁移能力的影响。5炎症因子及分泌因子水平检测及其相关信号通路运用western blot及qpcr检测细胞内产生的炎症因子tnfα和il1β的变化采用elisa试剂盒检测细胞释放的生长因子vegf和bfgf水平的变化。通过western blot检测akt信号通路相关蛋白的变化水平。6动物实验取6只成年sd大鼠麻醉备皮后用皮肤活检器于背部左右各取直径1cm圆形上皮全层组织。手术后每日注射01ml生理盐水或125nm四面体溶于生理盐水于左侧或右侧伤口周围皮下按时间顺序拍照记录术区伤口变化。术后第14、21天取术区上皮组织送检。7术区皮肤的组织学检测将送检的皮肤组织处理后行he染色、masson染色及tnfα、il1β的免疫荧光染色并行相关分析。结果在成功制备出符合标准的四面体后共聚焦显微镜共定位发现cy5四面体可以被ha ca t及hsf细胞大量摄取而cy5单链不能进入细胞。cck8实验发现125nm浓度四面体对两种细胞的增殖能力促进作用最强。流式细胞术检测证明125nm四面体可以促进细胞周期进入g2m期。细胞划痕实验表明细胞在125nm四面体作用下具有更强的迁移能力。此外四面体可以上调akt信号通路的表达从而减少细胞内产生的炎症因子并促进细胞释放生长因子。动物实验发现四面体处理组皮肤伤口愈合速度明显加快四面体可以促进上皮再生同时减少术区tnfα和il1β的产生遗址术区纤维化程度从而减轻瘢痕的产生。结论四面体核酸纳米材料可以促进角质形成细胞和表皮成纤维细胞的增殖、迁移并通过激活akt信号通路减少细胞炎症因子的产生促进细胞生长因子的分泌。同时四面体核酸纳米材料可以促进大鼠皮肤缺损的修复促进术区再上皮化抑制术区炎症反应及纤维化减轻瘢痕产生。
en_title: In vitro and in vivo studies of tetrahedral nucleic acid nanomaterials for skin defect repair
en_abstract: OBJECTIVE: To explore whether tetrahedral nucleic acid nanomaterials can promote the repair process of skin defects and its related mechanism. Materials and methods: 1. Preparation and identification of tetrahedral nucleic acid nanomaterials (referred to as tetrahedron): The four single strands constituting the tetrahedron were placed in TM buffer solution and annealed. The tetrahedron was successfully prepared by TEM and Zeta potential detection. 2. Uptake of Cy5-tetrahedron by HaCaT (human immortalized fibroblasts) and HSF (human epidermal fibroblasts): Cy5-tetrahedron and Cy5-ssDNA were treated for 8h, and the cells were detected by confocal microscopy. Uptake capacity of Cy5-tetrahedron and Cy5-single chain. 3. Cell proliferation-related research: CCK8 assay was used to detect the effect of tetrahedron on cell proliferation, and flow cytometry was used to detect the effect of tetrahedron on cell cycle. 4. Cell scratch experiment: In the cell scratch experiment, the scratch area was recorded at 0h, 6h and 24h to explore the effect of tetrahedron on the migration ability of the above two cells. 5. Detection of levels of inflammatory factors and secreted factors and their related signaling pathways: Western blot and qPCR were used to detect changes in inflammatory factors (TNF-α and IL-1β) produced in cells; ELISA kits were used to detect growth factors ( Changes in VEGF and bFGF) levels. The changes of AKT signaling pathway-related proteins were detected by Western blot. 6. Animal experiments: 6 adult SD rats were taken, and after skin preparation, a skin biopsy device was used to take full-thickness epithelial tissue with a diameter of 1 cm from the left and right sides of the back. After the operation, 0.1ml of normal saline or 125nM tetrahedron (dissolved in normal saline) was injected subcutaneously around the left or right wound every day, and the changes of the wound in the operation area were recorded by taking pictures in chronological order. On the 14th and 21st days after the operation, the epithelial tissue of the operation area was taken for examination. 7. Histological detection of the skin in the operation area: The skin tissue submitted for inspection was processed and then subjected to HE staining, Masson staining and immunofluorescence staining of TNF-α and IL-1β, and the correlation analysis was carried out in parallel. Results: After successful preparation of standard tetrahedrons, confocal microscopy co-localization found that Cy5-tetrahedrons could be taken up by HaCa T and HSF cells in large quantities, while Cy5-single chains could not enter cells. The CCK8 experiment found that 125nM tetrahedron had the strongest promoting effect on the proliferation ability of the two cells. Flow cytometry showed that 125nM tetrahedron could promote cell cycle into G2-M phase. The cell scratch experiments showed that the cells had stronger migration ability under the action of 125nM tetrahedron. In addition, tetrahedra can up-regulate the expression of AKT signaling pathway, thereby reducing the inflammatory factors produced in cells and promoting the release of growth factors from cells. Animal experiments found that the wound healing speed of the tetrahedron treatment group was significantly accelerated, and tetrahedron could promote epithelial regeneration, while reducing the production of TNF-α and IL-1β in the surgical site, and the degree of fibrosis in the surgical site, thereby reducing the generation of scars. Conclusion: Tetrahedral nucleic acid nanomaterials can promote the proliferation and migration of keratinocytes and epidermal fibroblasts, and reduce the production of inflammatory factors and promote the secretion of cell growth factors by activating the AKT signaling pathway. At the same time, tetrahedral nucleic acid nanomaterials can promote the repair of skin defects in rats, promote the re-epithelialization of the operation area, inhibit the inflammatory response and fibrosis in the operation area, and reduce the scarring.

title: 应用稳定同位素技术研究崂山湾夏季鱼类群落的摄食生态
abstract: 崂山湾是黄海沿岸众多海湾之一,也是当前增殖放流的重要水域,研究该区域鱼类群落结构及其食物网结构,有着非常重要的生态意义和实用价值。本研究根据2014年6月和8月在崂山湾海域进行的底拖网调查,分析该海域夏季鱼类群落的优势种组成,并通过测定稳定同位素对其摄食生态进行研究。结果表明,崂山湾夏季鱼类群落的优势鱼种共有10种,包括六丝矛尾鳅虎鱼、中华栉孔鳅虎鱼、红狼牙鳅虎鱼、皮氏叫姑鱼、白姑鱼、小黄鱼、绿鳍鱼、短吻红舌鳎、斑鲨和赤鼻棱鳀;夏季崂山湾不同月份鱼类群落的优势种组成差异较大。各优势鱼种间delta~(13)C值存在显著差异,结合胃含物分析结果表明6月鱼类群落食物的主要来源均为底层饵料,而8月鱼类群落的食物来源则更广泛。崂山湾夏季2个月鱼类群落的优势鱼种间的delta~(15)N值均存在显著差异,最大分别相差4.61和3.70。崂山湾6月鱼类群落的优势种包括了中营养级鱼类和高营养级鱼类,鱼类群落的平均营养级为3.90,主要是底栖动物食性鱼类;而8月鱼类群落的优势种包括了低营养级鱼类和中营养级鱼类,鱼类群落的平均营养级为3.37,包括浮游动物食性和底栖动物食性2种食性类型,以底栖动物食性鱼类为主。线性回归分析表明崂山湾夏季10种优势鱼种除皮氏叫姑鱼、斑鲨、短吻红舌鳎和绿鳍鱼的营养级与体长无线性相关外,其余优势鱼种的营养级均与体长呈显著的正相关。这主要由于它们随着体长的增加,摄食高营养级的饵料增加,低营养级的饵料减少,自身的营养级也随之升高。
text: 应用稳定同位素技术研究崂山湾夏季鱼类群落的摄食生态 崂山湾是黄海沿岸众多海湾之一也是当前增殖放流的重要水域研究该区域鱼类群落结构及其食物网结构有着非常重要的生态意义和实用价值。本研究根据2014年6月和8月在崂山湾海域进行的底拖网调查分析该海域夏季鱼类群落的优势种组成并通过测定稳定同位素对其摄食生态进行研究。结果表明崂山湾夏季鱼类群落的优势鱼种共有10种包括六丝矛尾鳅虎鱼、中华栉孔鳅虎鱼、红狼牙鳅虎鱼、皮氏叫姑鱼、白姑鱼、小黄鱼、绿鳍鱼、短吻红舌鳎、斑鲨和赤鼻棱鳀夏季崂山湾不同月份鱼类群落的优势种组成差异较大。各优势鱼种间delta13c值存在显著差异结合胃含物分析结果表明6月鱼类群落食物的主要来源均为底层饵料而8月鱼类群落的食物来源则更广泛。崂山湾夏季2个月鱼类群落的优势鱼种间的delta15n值均存在显著差异最大分别相差461和370。崂山湾6月鱼类群落的优势种包括了中营养级鱼类和高营养级鱼类鱼类群落的平均营养级为390主要是底栖动物食性鱼类而8月鱼类群落的优势种包括了低营养级鱼类和中营养级鱼类鱼类群落的平均营养级为337包括浮游动物食性和底栖动物食性2种食性类型以底栖动物食性鱼类为主。线性回归分析表明崂山湾夏季10种优势鱼种除皮氏叫姑鱼、斑鲨、短吻红舌鳎和绿鳍鱼的营养级与体长无线性相关外其余优势鱼种的营养级均与体长呈显著的正相关。这主要由于它们随着体长的增加摄食高营养级的饵料增加低营养级的饵料减少自身的营养级也随之升高。
en_title: Application of stable isotope techniques to study the feeding ecology of summer fish communities in Laoshan Bay
en_abstract: Laoshan Bay is one of the many bays along the coast of the Yellow Sea, and it is also an important water area for current proliferation and release. The study of fish community structure and food web structure in this area has very important ecological significance and practical value. Based on the bottom trawling survey conducted in the Laoshan Bay sea area in June and August 2014, this study analyzed the composition of dominant species of fish communities in the sea area in summer, and studied their feeding ecology by measuring stable isotopes. The results showed that there were 10 dominant fish species in the summer fish community in Laoshan Bay, including the six-wire spear-tailed gobies, the Chinese Ct. Small yellow croaker, greenfin fish, short-nose red tongue sole, spotted shark and red-nosed anchovy; the composition of dominant species of fish community in Laoshan Bay in different months in summer is quite different. There were significant differences in delta~(13)C values among the dominant fish species. Combined with the analysis of gastric contents, the main food sources of the fish community in June were bottom food, while the food sources of the fish community in August were more extensive. There were significant differences in the delta~(15)N values of the dominant fish species in the fish community in Laoshan Bay during the two months in summer, with the largest differences being 4.61 and 3.70, respectively. The dominant species of the fish community in Laoshan Bay in June included mesotrophic fish and high trophic fish, the average trophic level of the fish community was 3.90, mainly benthic fish; The dominant species included low-trophic fish and mesotrophic fish. The average trophic level of the fish community was 3.37, including zooplankton and benthic fish, and benthic fish were the main ones. Linear regression analysis showed that the trophic levels of the 10 dominant fish species in Laoshan Bay in summer were not linearly correlated with body length, except the trophic level of P. There was a significant positive correlation with body length. This is mainly due to the fact that with the increase of body length, they eat more high-trophic-grade bait, and less low-trophic-grade bait, and their own trophic grade also increases.

title: 汽轮机汽封节能改造项目对火力发电企业经济效益的提升
abstract: 本文基于火力发电企业的节能减排问题,对某火电厂汽轮机组的汽封进行改造,以实现整个机组热耗率的降低以及煤耗的节约,利用全面优化后的实验结果对其经济效果进行综合分析与评估,最终明确改造方案能够对火电厂带来更高的经济效益。
text: 汽轮机汽封节能改造项目对火力发电企业经济效益的提升 本文基于火力发电企业的节能减排问题对某火电厂汽轮机组的汽封进行改造以实现整个机组热耗率的降低以及煤耗的节约利用全面优化后的实验结果对其经济效果进行综合分析与评估最终明确改造方案能够对火电厂带来更高的经济效益。
en_title: The improvement of the economic benefit of the thermal power generation enterprise by the energy-saving renovation project of the steam turbine seal
en_abstract: Based on the problem of energy saving and emission reduction of thermal power generation enterprises, this paper reforms the steam seal of a steam turbine unit of a thermal power plant to reduce the heat consumption rate of the whole unit and save coal consumption, and use the comprehensive optimized experimental results to synthesize its economic effects After analysis and evaluation, it is finally clear that the transformation plan can bring higher economic benefits to the thermal power plant.

title: 甲状旁腺素在急性肾损伤和慢性肾脏病鉴别诊断中的价值
abstract: 目的探讨甲状旁腺素(PTH)在急性肾损伤和慢性肾脏病鉴别诊断中的价值。方法收集2015年1月—2018年11月30日在郑州大学第一附属医院治疗的肾功能不全[eGFR<60 mL/(min·1.73 m~2)]且已行肾穿刺病人598例,根据病史、肾活检结果及临床转归进行分组;A组(急性肾损伤)191例,B组(慢性肾脏病)407例。收集所有患者的一般资料,包括性别、年龄等基本资料,测定实验室指标,包括血红蛋白、血清肌酐、尿素氮、尿酸、eGFR并进行相关的统计学分析,绘制PTH相关的受试者工作特征(ROC)曲线,测定PTH诊断的特异性和灵敏度,评价其对急性肾损伤和慢性肾脏病的诊断价值。结果 B组(慢性脏病组)PTH浓度与A组(急性肾损伤组)PTH对比差异有统计学意义(P<0.05),ROC曲线下面积0.552。结论我们通过对急性肾损伤(AKI)和慢性肾脏病(CKD)患者血清甲状旁腺素(PTH)含量测定,统计学分析发现,PTH水平对急性肾损伤与慢性肾脏病鉴别诊断有一定的价值。
text: 甲状旁腺素在急性肾损伤和慢性肾脏病鉴别诊断中的价值 目的探讨甲状旁腺素pth在急性肾损伤和慢性肾脏病鉴别诊断中的价值。方法收集2015年1月—2018年11月30日在郑州大学第一附属医院治疗的肾功能不全egfr60 mlmin·173 m2且已行肾穿刺病人598例根据病史、肾活检结果及临床转归进行分组a组急性肾损伤191例b组慢性肾脏病407例。收集所有患者的一般资料包括性别、年龄等基本资料测定实验室指标包括血红蛋白、血清肌酐、尿素氮、尿酸、egfr并进行相关的统计学分析绘制pth相关的受试者工作特征roc曲线测定pth诊断的特异性和灵敏度评价其对急性肾损伤和慢性肾脏病的诊断价值。结果 b组慢性脏病组pth浓度与a组急性肾损伤组pth对比差异有统计学意义p005roc曲线下面积0552。结论我们通过对急性肾损伤aki和慢性肾脏病ckd患者血清甲状旁腺素pth含量测定统计学分析发现pth水平对急性肾损伤与慢性肾脏病鉴别诊断有一定的价值。
en_title: The value of parathyroid hormone in the differential diagnosis of acute kidney injury and chronic kidney disease
en_abstract: Objective To investigate the value of parathyroid hormone (PTH) in the differential diagnosis of acute kidney injury and chronic kidney disease. Methods A total of 598 patients with renal insufficiency [eGFR<60 mL/(min·1.73 m~2)] who had undergone renal puncture in the First Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University from January 2015 to November 30, 2018 were collected. Medical history, renal biopsy results and clinical outcomes were divided into groups; 191 cases in group A (acute kidney injury) and 407 cases in group B (chronic kidney disease). The general data of all patients, including gender, age and other basic data, were collected, and laboratory indexes, including hemoglobin, serum creatinine, blood urea nitrogen, uric acid, and eGFR, were determined and related statistical analysis was performed, and the receiver operating characteristics related to PTH were drawn ( The ROC curve was used to determine the specificity and sensitivity of PTH diagnosis, and to evaluate its diagnostic value for acute kidney injury and chronic kidney disease. Results The PTH concentration of group B (chronic heart disease group) was significantly different from that of group A (acute kidney injury group) (P<0.05), and the area under the ROC curve was 0.552. Conclusion We measured serum parathyroid hormone (PTH) levels in patients with acute kidney injury (AKI) and chronic kidney disease (CKD), and statistical analysis found that PTH levels have certain value in the differential diagnosis of acute kidney injury and chronic kidney disease. .

title: 重组单链尿激酶型纤溶酶原激活剂对实验性肺栓塞的影响
abstract: 本研究通过将自体血凝块注入股静脉以建立犬急性PTE模型,并比较血液动力学参数的变化,研究国产重组单胞菌尿激酶型纤溶酶原激活剂(scu-PA)、重组组织型纤溶酶原激活剂(rt-PA)和肝素对犬肺动脉血栓栓塞(PTE)的治疗效果。将自体血凝块注入19只犬体内,并且将这些狗随机分为3组:scu-PA组(n=6)、 rt-PA组(n=6)、肝素组(n=7),分别在手术前和手术后2 h和3 h进行血流动力学和肺血管造影的测量。本研究发现,(1)血栓注射后,平均肺动脉压(mPAP)明显增加(p<0.01),心排血量(CO; p<0.01)降低;(2)治疗后2 h和3 h进行组间比较:scu-PA和rt-PA组的mPAP值显著低于肝素组(p<0.05);(3)溶栓后的组内比较,mPAP明显下降(p<0.01),肝素组进一步降低CO;(4)肺血管造影评分:两组溶栓组降低幅度高于肝素组。本研究结果初步表明在血液动力学和血管造影改善方面,国产重组scu-PA对实验性PTE的作用类似于rt-PA,优于肝素。
text: 重组单链尿激酶型纤溶酶原激活剂对实验性肺栓塞的影响 本研究通过将自体血凝块注入股静脉以建立犬急性pte模型并比较血液动力学参数的变化研究国产重组单胞菌尿激酶型纤溶酶原激活剂scupa、重组组织型纤溶酶原激活剂rtpa和肝素对犬肺动脉血栓栓塞pte的治疗效果。将自体血凝块注入19只犬体内并且将这些狗随机分为3组scupa组n6、 rtpa组n6、肝素组n7分别在手术前和手术后2 h和3 h进行血流动力学和肺血管造影的测量。本研究发现1血栓注射后平均肺动脉压mpap明显增加p001心排血量co p001降低2治疗后2 h和3 h进行组间比较scupa和rtpa组的mpap值显著低于肝素组p0053溶栓后的组内比较mpap明显下降p001肝素组进一步降低co4肺血管造影评分两组溶栓组降低幅度高于肝素组。本研究结果初步表明在血液动力学和血管造影改善方面国产重组scupa对实验性pte的作用类似于rtpa优于肝素。
en_title: Effects of recombinant single-chain urokinase-type plasminogen activator on experimental pulmonary embolism
en_abstract: In this study, a dog model of acute PTE was established by injecting autologous blood clots into the femoral vein, and the changes in hemodynamic parameters were compared. Therapeutic effect of plasminogen activator (rt-PA) and heparin on pulmonary thromboembolism (PTE) in dogs. Autologous blood clots were injected into 19 dogs, and the dogs were randomly divided into 3 groups: scu-PA group (n=6), rt-PA group (n=6), heparin group (n=7), respectively. Measurements of hemodynamics and pulmonary angiography were performed before surgery and at 2 and 3 h after surgery. This study found that (1) mean pulmonary arterial pressure (mPAP) was significantly increased (p<0.01) and cardiac output (CO; p<0.01) was decreased after thrombus injection; Inter-group comparison: the mPAP values of the scu-PA and rt-PA groups were significantly lower than those of the heparin group (p<0.05); (3) In the intra-group comparison after thrombolysis, the mPAP was significantly decreased (p<0.01), and the heparin group further reduced CO ; (4) Pulmonary angiography score: the reduction in the thrombolysis group was higher than that in the heparin group. The results of this study preliminarily showed that the effect of domestic recombinant scu-PA on experimental PTE was similar to rt-PA, and better than heparin in terms of hemodynamics and angiography improvement.

title: 项目管理模式在住院医师规范化培训中的创新应用及探索
abstract: 住院医师规范化培训是一项涉及人、财、物需建立综合政策机制的系统工程。项目管理是对成功达成一系列目标的整体监测和管控。为了提高住院医师培训效果,寻找新的培训方式和方法,本文研究了将项目管理模式应用于住院医师规范化培训教学工作的优势,有针对性的找出问题,设置项目完成目标,根据设定目标确定参与人,制定方案及监督实施,评估完成情况,未完善或新出现的问题进入下一个项目管理循环。将4个项目总目标分解成8个考核点,并制定时间表、路线图,逐一攻破,效果显著。并提出进一步创新应用的建议:项目管理模式体现"全融合"理念及资源整合优势,在该项工作中,项目管理的模式可以纵横交错,灵活运用。若以医疗机构为基点,向外部延伸,通过横向融合项目管理,向医疗机构内部延伸,则可通过项目管理模式解决教学工作中的复杂及瓶颈问题,同时项目目标可根据多层次实际需求设定。
text: 项目管理模式在住院医师规范化培训中的创新应用及探索 住院医师规范化培训是一项涉及人、财、物需建立综合政策机制的系统工程。项目管理是对成功达成一系列目标的整体监测和管控。为了提高住院医师培训效果寻找新的培训方式和方法本文研究了将项目管理模式应用于住院医师规范化培训教学工作的优势有针对性的找出问题设置项目完成目标根据设定目标确定参与人制定方案及监督实施评估完成情况未完善或新出现的问题进入下一个项目管理循环。将4个项目总目标分解成8个考核点并制定时间表、路线图逐一攻破效果显著。并提出进一步创新应用的建议项目管理模式体现全融合理念及资源整合优势在该项工作中项目管理的模式可以纵横交错灵活运用。若以医疗机构为基点向外部延伸通过横向融合项目管理向医疗机构内部延伸则可通过项目管理模式解决教学工作中的复杂及瓶颈问题同时项目目标可根据多层次实际需求设定。
en_title: Innovative application and exploration of project management mode in standardized training of residents
en_abstract: The standardized training of resident physicians is a systematic project involving the establishment of a comprehensive policy mechanism involving human, financial and material needs. Project management is the overall monitoring and control of the successful achievement of a set of objectives. In order to improve the training effect of residents and find new training methods and methods, this paper studies the advantages of applying the project management model to the standardized training and teaching of residents, finds out problems, sets project completion goals, and sets goals according to the set goals. Identify participants, formulate plans and supervise implementation, evaluate completion, and enter the next project management cycle for incomplete or emerging problems. The overall goals of the 4 projects were decomposed into 8 assessment points, and a timetable and a roadmap were formulated to break through them one by one, and the effect was remarkable. And put forward suggestions for further innovative applications: the project management model reflects the concept of "full integration" and the advantages of resource integration. In this work, the project management model can be crisscrossed and used flexibly. If the medical institution is used as the starting point to extend to the outside, and to extend to the medical institution through horizontal integration of project management, the complex and bottleneck problems in the teaching work can be solved through the project management model, and the project goals can be set according to the actual needs of multiple levels. .

title: 高职院校大学生“校园贷”风险防范与教育引导问题研究
abstract: <正>近年来,"校园贷"在现代高校中都有出现,并且出现频率逐步提升。高职院校中"校园贷"的风险问题更加频繁出现,导致大学生的信用财产安全受到威胁,"校园贷"平台是促使风险出现的主要原因,受到了社会的广泛关注。"校园贷"在进展过程中提了一些问题,也造成大学生方面的问题,为了实行更有效的教学引导,要做好"校园贷"风险防范工作与教育引导,高职院校应当和各个部门调整与协调,共同促进大学生的教育引导工作,实现对大学生思想理念的正确引导,做好"校园贷"风险防范与教育引导。
text: 高职院校大学生“校园贷”风险防范与教育引导问题研究 正近年来校园贷在现代高校中都有出现并且出现频率逐步提升。高职院校中校园贷的风险问题更加频繁出现导致大学生的信用财产安全受到威胁校园贷平台是促使风险出现的主要原因受到了社会的广泛关注。校园贷在进展过程中提了一些问题也造成大学生方面的问题为了实行更有效的教学引导要做好校园贷风险防范工作与教育引导高职院校应当和各个部门调整与协调共同促进大学生的教育引导工作实现对大学生思想理念的正确引导做好校园贷风险防范与教育引导。
en_title: Research on risk prevention and education guidance of college students' "campus loan" in higher vocational colleges
en_abstract: <正>In recent years, "campus loans" have appeared in modern colleges and universities, and the frequency of occurrence has gradually increased. The risk of "campus loan" in higher vocational colleges appears more frequently, which leads to threats to the security of college students' credit property. "Campus Loan" raised some problems in the process of progress, and also caused problems for college students. In order to implement more effective teaching guidance, to do a good job in "campus loan" risk prevention and education guidance, higher vocational colleges should work with various departments Adjust and coordinate, jointly promote the education and guidance of college students, realize the correct guidance of college students' ideological concepts, and do a good job in "campus loan" risk prevention and education guidance.

title: “信号与系统”与“数字信号处理”课程整合的研究与实践
abstract: 对"信号与系统"和"数字信号处理"这2门信息类专业的核心课程进行了整合,建立了新的课程体系,对教学内容、教学方式、教学手段、实验教学、考核方式等方面进行了改革,阐述了关于这2门课程整合的研究与实践.
text: “信号与系统”与“数字信号处理”课程整合的研究与实践 对信号与系统和数字信号处理这2门信息类专业的核心课程进行了整合建立了新的课程体系对教学内容、教学方式、教学手段、实验教学、考核方式等方面进行了改革阐述了关于这2门课程整合的研究与实践
en_title: Research and practice on the integration of "Signal and System" and "Digital Signal Processing" courses
en_abstract: The two core courses of information majors, "Signal and System" and "Digital Signal Processing", have been integrated, and a new curriculum system has been established. The reform was introduced, and the research and practice on the integration of these two courses were expounded.

title: 三款口内三维扫描仪获取无牙颌红膏初印模精度的对比评价
abstract: 目的:分析比较了三款口内三维扫描仪扫描无牙颌红膏初印模及颌位记录的精度,为口内三维扫描仪应用于扫描无牙颌红膏初印模及颌位记录、制作临床诊断义齿提供参考。方法:共纳入无牙颌患者红膏初印模6副,每副印模包含上颌初印模、下颌初印模和上颌背面的颌位记录。使用Dentscan Y500牙颌模型三维扫描仪扫描红膏初印模获取三角网格数据(stereolithography,STL)格式数据作为参考模型。分别使用i500,Trios 3和CEREC Primescan三款口内三维扫描仪扫描红膏初印模获取STL数据,重复3次作为实验组。在Geomagic Studio 2013软件中,将口内三维扫描仪扫描获得的数据与参考模型比较评价正确度,同一扫描仪三次扫描的数据互相比较评价精密度。将口内三维扫描仪扫描的上颌数据与参考模型上颌数据配准,评价颌位记录扫描的形态误差。将口内三维扫描仪扫描的下颌与颌位记录配准,评价下颌颌位的偏差。采用SPSS 20.0统计软件,对三款口内三维扫描仪的正确度、精密度和颌位记录的形态误差分别进行独立样本t检验和Mann-Whitney U非参数检验。采用Bland-Altman图示法对三款口内三维扫描仪测量的下颌颌位的一致性进行两两评价,判断其在垂直方向、前后方向和左右方向偏移量的差异。结果:i500、Trios 3和CEREC Primescan三款扫描仪的正确度分别为:上颌(182.34  101.21)mum,(145.21  71.73)mum,(78.34  34.79)mum;下颌(106.42  21.63)mum,95.08(63.08)mum,(78.45  42.77)mum。扫描上、下颌时三款扫描仪的正确度差异无统计学意义(P >0.05)。三款扫描仪的精密度分别为:上颌147.65(156.30)mum,(147.54  83.33)mum,40.30(32.80)mum;下颌(90.96  30.77)mum,(53.73  23.56)mum,37.60(93.93)mum。扫描上颌时CEREC Primescan扫描仪精密度显著优于另两款扫描仪(P <0.05),扫描下颌时Trios 3和CEREC Primescan扫描仪的精密度显著优于i500扫描仪(P <0.05),i500和Trios 3扫描仪扫描下颌的精密度优于上颌(P <0.05)。三款扫描仪扫描上、下颌初印模的正确度和精密度的95%置信区间的上、下限均在 300 mum范围内。扫描颌位记录的形态误差,i500扫描仪(337.68  128.54)mum,Trios 3扫描仪(342.89  195.41)mum,CEREC Primescan扫描仪(168.62  88.35)mum,i500扫描仪和Trios 3扫描仪的95%置信区间上限大于300 mum,CEREC Primescan扫描仪显著优于i500扫描仪(P <0.05)。扫描测量的下颌颌位,垂直差异:i500扫描仪(0.83  0.56)mm,Trios 3扫描仪(0.80  0.45)mm,CEREC Primescan扫描仪(0.91  0.75)mm;水平前后差异:i500扫描仪(0.79  0.58)mm,Trios 3扫描仪(0.62  0.18)mm,CEREC Primescan扫描仪(0.53  0.53)mm;水平左右差异:i500扫描仪(0.95  0.59)mm,Trios 3扫描仪(0.69  0.45)mm,CEREC Primescan扫描仪(0.60  0.22)mm。 Bland-Altman图示法三款扫描仪扫描获得的下颌颌位在垂直方向、前后方向和左右方向的偏移量两两之间比较均位于95%一致性界限内。结论:三款口内三维扫描仪扫描上、下颌红膏初印模表现出较好的正确度和精密度,i500和Trios 3扫描仪记录的颌位记录的误差较大,但仅作为初始颌位记录使用,提示临床医生可以使用这三种口内三维扫描仪应用于数字化全口义齿前期数据获取来制作诊断义齿和个别托盘,减少将红膏初印模长途寄运至技工室导致的红膏碰撞破损及高温变形。
text: 三款口内三维扫描仪获取无牙颌红膏初印模精度的对比评价 目的分析比较了三款口内三维扫描仪扫描无牙颌红膏初印模及颌位记录的精度为口内三维扫描仪应用于扫描无牙颌红膏初印模及颌位记录、制作临床诊断义齿提供参考。方法共纳入无牙颌患者红膏初印模6副每副印模包含上颌初印模、下颌初印模和上颌背面的颌位记录。使用dentscan y500牙颌模型三维扫描仪扫描红膏初印模获取三角网格数据stereolithographystl格式数据作为参考模型。分别使用i500trios 3和cerec primescan三款口内三维扫描仪扫描红膏初印模获取stl数据重复3次作为实验组。在geomagic studio 2013软件中将口内三维扫描仪扫描获得的数据与参考模型比较评价正确度同一扫描仪三次扫描的数据互相比较评价精密度。将口内三维扫描仪扫描的上颌数据与参考模型上颌数据配准评价颌位记录扫描的形态误差。将口内三维扫描仪扫描的下颌与颌位记录配准评价下颌颌位的偏差。采用spss 200统计软件对三款口内三维扫描仪的正确度、精密度和颌位记录的形态误差分别进行独立样本t检验和mannwhitney u非参数检验。采用blandaltman图示法对三款口内三维扫描仪测量的下颌颌位的一致性进行两两评价判断其在垂直方向、前后方向和左右方向偏移量的差异。结果i500、trios 3和cerec primescan三款扫描仪的正确度分别为上颌18234 10121mum14521 7173mum7834 3479mum下颌10642 2163mum95086308mum7845 4277mum。扫描上、下颌时三款扫描仪的正确度差异无统计学意义p 005。三款扫描仪的精密度分别为上颌1476515630mum14754 8333mum40303280mum下颌9096 3077mum5373 2356mum37609393mum。扫描上颌时cerec primescan扫描仪精密度显著优于另两款扫描仪p 005扫描下颌时trios 3和cerec primescan扫描仪的精密度显著优于i500扫描仪p 005i500和trios 3扫描仪扫描下颌的精密度优于上颌p 005。三款扫描仪扫描上、下颌初印模的正确度和精密度的95置信区间的上、下限均在 300 mum范围内。扫描颌位记录的形态误差i500扫描仪33768 12854mumtrios 3扫描仪34289 19541mumcerec primescan扫描仪16862 8835mumi500扫描仪和trios 3扫描仪的95置信区间上限大于300 mumcerec primescan扫描仪显著优于i500扫描仪p 005。扫描测量的下颌颌位垂直差异i500扫描仪083 056mmtrios 3扫描仪080 045mmcerec primescan扫描仪091 075mm水平前后差异i500扫描仪079 058mmtrios 3扫描仪062 018mmcerec primescan扫描仪053 053mm水平左右差异i500扫描仪095 059mmtrios 3扫描仪069 045mmcerec primescan扫描仪060 022mm。 blandaltman图示法三款扫描仪扫描获得的下颌颌位在垂直方向、前后方向和左右方向的偏移量两两之间比较均位于95一致性界限内。结论三款口内三维扫描仪扫描上、下颌红膏初印模表现出较好的正确度和精密度i500和trios 3扫描仪记录的颌位记录的误差较大但仅作为初始颌位记录使用提示临床医生可以使用这三种口内三维扫描仪应用于数字化全口义齿前期数据获取来制作诊断义齿和个别托盘减少将红膏初印模长途寄运至技工室导致的红膏碰撞破损及高温变形。
en_title: Comparative evaluation of the accuracy of three intraoral 3D scanners for obtaining initial impressions of edentulous red paste
en_abstract: OBJECTIVE: To analyze and compare the accuracy of three intraoral 3D scanners in scanning the initial impression and jaw position record of edentulous red paste, so as to provide a reference for the application of intraoral 3D scanner to scan the initial impression and jaw position record of edentulous jaw, and make clinical practice. Provide a reference for diagnosing dentures. Methods: A total of 6 initial impressions with red paste for edentulous patients were included, and each impression included the initial impression of the upper jaw, the initial impression of the lower jaw and the jaw position record of the back of the upper jaw. Using the Dentscan Y500 dental and jaw model three-dimensional scanner to scan the red paste initial impression to obtain the triangular mesh data (stereolithography, STL) format data as the reference model. Three intraoral 3D scanners i500, Trios 3 and CEREC Primescan were used to scan the initial impression of red paste to obtain STL data, and repeated three times as the experimental group. In Geomagic Studio 2013 software, the data obtained from the intraoral 3D scanner was compared with the reference model to evaluate the accuracy, and the data from three scans of the same scanner were compared to each other to evaluate the precision. The maxillary data scanned by the intraoral 3D scanner was registered with the maxillary data of the reference model to evaluate the morphological error of the jaw position record scanning. The mandible scanned by the intraoral 3D scanner was registered with the jaw position record to evaluate the deviation of the mandibular position. Using SPSS 20.0 statistical software, independent samples t test and Mann-Whitney U nonparametric test were performed on the accuracy and precision of the three intraoral 3D scanners, as well as the morphological error of jaw position recording, respectively. The Bland-Altman graphical method was used to evaluate the consistency of the mandibular position measured by the three intraoral 3D scanners, and to judge the differences in the vertical, anterior-posterior and left-right directions. Results: The accuracy of the three scanners i500, Trios 3 and CEREC Primescan were: maxillary (182.34 101.21)mum, (145.21 71.73)mum, (78.34 34.79)mum; mandibular (106.42 21.63)mum, 95.08(63.08)mum , (78.45 42.77)mum. There was no significant difference in the accuracy of the three scanners when scanning the upper and lower jaws (P > 0.05). The precisions of the three scanners are: maxillary 147.65(156.30)mum, (147.54 83.33)mum, 40.30(32.80)mum; mandibular (90.96 30.77)mum, (53.73 23.56)mum, 37.60(93.93)mum. The precision of the CEREC Primescan scanner was significantly better than the other two scanners when scanning the upper jaw (P < 0.05), and the precision of the Trios 3 and CEREC Primescan scanners was significantly better than that of the i500 scanner when scanning the lower jaw (P < 0.05). The precision of scanning the mandible with the Trios 3 scanner was better than that of the maxilla (P < 0.05). The upper and lower limits of the 95% confidence intervals for the accuracy and precision of the initial impressions of the upper and lower jaws scanned by the three scanners were all within the range of 300 mum. Morphological errors of scanned jaw records, i500 scanner (337.68 128.54) mum, Trios 3 scanner (342.89 195.41) mum, CEREC Primescan scanner (168.62 88.35) mum, 95% confidence intervals for i500 scanner and Trios 3 scanner For upper limit greater than 300 mum, CEREC Primescan scanner was significantly better than i500 scanner (P < 0.05). Mandibular position measured by scanning, vertical difference: i500 scanner (0.83 0.56) mm, Trios 3 scanner (0.80 0.45) mm, CEREC Primescan scanner (0.91 0.75) mm; horizontal anterior-posterior difference: i500 scanner (0.79 0.58) mm, Trios 3 Scanner (0.62 0.18) mm, CEREC Primescan Scanner (0.53 0.53) mm; Horizontal Left-Right Difference: i500 Scanner (0.95 0.59) mm, Trios 3 Scanner (0.69 0.45) mm, CEREC Primescan Scanner ( 0.60 0.22) mm. The deviations of the mandibular position obtained by the three scanners in the Bland-Altman graphic method in the vertical, anterior-posterior, and left-right directions were all within the 95% concordance limit. Conclusion: The three intraoral 3D scanners showed good accuracy and precision in scanning the initial impression of the upper and lower jaw with red paste. The jaw position recorded by the i500 and Trios 3 scanners had larger errors, but they were only used as the initial jaw position. The use of records suggests that clinicians can use these three intraoral 3D scanners to obtain pre-digital full denture data to make diagnostic dentures and individual trays, reducing the collision of red paste caused by long-distance shipping of red paste initial impressions to the laboratory damage and high temperature deformation.

title: 丰乐农化、久易农业入围合肥市“数字化车间”拟认定名单
abstract: <正>近日,合肥市经济和信息化委员会公布了2017年合肥市"智能工厂"、"数字化车间"拟认定名单,安徽丰乐农化有限责任公司的"农药制剂加工、包装数字化车间"以及安徽久易农业股份有限公司的"4号合成数字化车间"名列其中。丰乐农化的"农药制剂二期工程"项目建设基本结束,目前正在办理项目验收手续。该项目自2016年开始建设,其中包括农药粉粒剂车间、农药微囊悬
text: 丰乐农化、久易农业入围合肥市“数字化车间”拟认定名单 正近日合肥市经济和信息化委员会公布了2017年合肥市智能工厂、数字化车间拟认定名单安徽丰乐农化有限责任公司的农药制剂加工、包装数字化车间以及安徽久易农业股份有限公司的4号合成数字化车间名列其中。丰乐农化的农药制剂二期工程项目建设基本结束目前正在办理项目验收手续。该项目自2016年开始建设其中包括农药粉粒剂车间、农药微囊悬
en_title: Fengle Agrochemical and Jiuyi Agriculture are shortlisted for Hefei's "Digital Workshop" to be recognized
en_abstract: <正>Recently, the Economic and Information Commission of Hefei City announced the list of "intelligent factories" and "digital workshops" in Hefei in 2017. The "No. 4 Synthetic Digital Workshop" of Anhui Jiuyi Agriculture Co., Ltd. is among them. The construction of Fengle Agrochemical's "Phase II Project of Pesticide Preparations" has basically been completed, and the project acceptance procedures are currently being handled. The project has been under construction since 2016, including pesticide powder and granule workshop, pesticide microcapsule suspension

title: 新疆高校大学生养成教育研究——以和田师范专科学校为例
abstract: 由于新疆高校的特殊性,受民族习惯、宗教习俗的影响,在大学生养成教育方面存在诸多认识不到位的情况,诸如行为习惯、道德素质及心理上等问题。面对如此问题,加强新疆高校大学生的养成教育是非常重要和必要的。本文以和田师范专科学校大学生养成教育为研究对象,揭示新疆高校大学生养成教育普遍存在的问题及其成因分析,为此,提出几点解决新疆高校大学生养成教育的途径。
text: 新疆高校大学生养成教育研究——以和田师范专科学校为例 由于新疆高校的特殊性受民族习惯、宗教习俗的影响在大学生养成教育方面存在诸多认识不到位的情况诸如行为习惯、道德素质及心理上等问题。面对如此问题加强新疆高校大学生的养成教育是非常重要和必要的。本文以和田师范专科学校大学生养成教育为研究对象揭示新疆高校大学生养成教育普遍存在的问题及其成因分析为此提出几点解决新疆高校大学生养成教育的途径。
en_title: Research on the development of college students in Xinjiang colleges and universities——Taking Hotan Teachers College as an example
en_abstract: Due to the particularity of colleges and universities in Xinjiang, influenced by ethnic customs and religious customs, there are many problems in the cultivation and education of college students, such as behavioral habits, moral quality and psychological problems. Facing such a problem, it is very important and necessary to strengthen the cultivation education of college students in Xinjiang. Taking the development education of college students in Hotan Normal College as the research object, this paper reveals the common problems and causes analysis of the development education of college students in Xinjiang.

title: 闽南山区软弱围岩小净距隧道超前支护力学机理与施工技术
abstract: 以福建三明莆炎高速公路布盂隧道工程为依托,建立了基于Winkler弹性地基梁理论的管棚力学模型,通过理论和数值模拟相结合的方法,研究了软弱围岩浅埋偏压小净距隧道超前支护力学特性及施工控制技术。研究结果表明:在隧道开挖过程中,掌子面处管棚受力较大,支护稳定后受力较小且较为均匀。采用管棚超前支护后,能够有效控制隧道拱顶沉降和改善衬砌结构受力状态。相较无超前支护,管棚支护后左、右洞拱顶沉降分别减少了32.64%和28.14%,拱腰处最大、最小主应力分别减少了15.66%和17.75%,拱脚处最大、最小主应力分别减少了12.18%和23.40%。采用管棚超前支护有利于增强围岩稳定性以及限制围岩塑性区发展,管棚支护后围岩最大塑性应变降低了32.78%。
text: 闽南山区软弱围岩小净距隧道超前支护力学机理与施工技术 以福建三明莆炎高速公路布盂隧道工程为依托建立了基于winkler弹性地基梁理论的管棚力学模型通过理论和数值模拟相结合的方法研究了软弱围岩浅埋偏压小净距隧道超前支护力学特性及施工控制技术。研究结果表明在隧道开挖过程中掌子面处管棚受力较大支护稳定后受力较小且较为均匀。采用管棚超前支护后能够有效控制隧道拱顶沉降和改善衬砌结构受力状态。相较无超前支护管棚支护后左、右洞拱顶沉降分别减少了3264和2814拱腰处最大、最小主应力分别减少了1566和1775拱脚处最大、最小主应力分别减少了1218和2340。采用管棚超前支护有利于增强围岩稳定性以及限制围岩塑性区发展管棚支护后围岩最大塑性应变降低了3278。
en_title: Mechanical mechanism and construction technology of advanced support for small clear distance tunnels with weak surrounding rock in southern Fujian mountain area
en_abstract: Based on the Buyu Tunnel Project of Sanming-Puyan Expressway in Fujian Province, a pipe shed mechanics model based on the Winkler elastic foundation beam theory was established. Through the method of combining theory and numerical simulation, the shallow-buried bias pressure and small clear distance of weak surrounding rock were studied. Mechanical characteristics and construction control technology of tunnel advance support. The research results show that: in the process of tunnel excavation, the stress on the tube shed at the tunnel face is larger, and the stress is smaller and more uniform after the support is stabilized. After adopting the advanced support of the pipe shed, the settlement of the tunnel vault can be effectively controlled and the stress state of the lining structure can be improved. Compared with no advanced support, the vault settlement of the left and right caves decreased by 32.64% and 28.14%, respectively, and the maximum and minimum principal stresses at the arch waist were reduced by 15.66% and 17.75%, respectively. The minimum principal stress decreased by 12.18% and 23.40%, respectively. The use of the pipe shed advance support is beneficial to enhance the stability of the surrounding rock and limit the development of the surrounding rock plastic zone, and the maximum plastic strain of the surrounding rock is reduced by 32.78% after the pipe shed support.

title: 学校间均衡发展刍议——义务教育阶段“重点学校”现象分析
abstract: 教育均衡发展是新时期教育改革发展的迫切需要。改革开放以来,我国的义务教育得到了长足发展,从总体上达到了普及的程度。但是,非均衡发展现象也严重存在,主要表现为地区、城乡、校际、群体等方面的差别。就校际差别而言,＂薄弱学校＂与＂重点学校＂现象值得关注。
text: 学校间均衡发展刍议——义务教育阶段“重点学校”现象分析 教育均衡发展是新时期教育改革发展的迫切需要。改革开放以来我国的义务教育得到了长足发展从总体上达到了普及的程度。但是非均衡发展现象也严重存在主要表现为地区、城乡、校际、群体等方面的差别。就校际差别而言＂薄弱学校＂与＂重点学校＂现象值得关注。
en_title: A Humble Opinion on the Balanced Development of Schools——Analysis of the Phenomenon of "Key Schools" in the Stage of Compulsory Education
en_abstract: The balanced development of education is the urgent need of education reform and development in the new era. Since the reform and opening up, my country's compulsory education has developed by leaps and bounds. However, the phenomenon of unbalanced development also exists seriously, which is mainly manifested in the differences between regions, urban and rural areas, inter-schools, and groups. In terms of inter-school differences, the phenomena of "weak schools" and "key schools" deserve attention.

title: 文化与商业结合的典范之作——评电影《阿凡达》的成功模式
abstract: 电影《阿凡达》在全球获得的成功,首先归功于它的艺术水准与好莱坞的成功制作与商业运作。同时,《阿凡达》成功地传播了美国人所崇尚的文化价值,体现了好莱坞电影文化的巨大包容性,表达了对人类文明的质疑和反思,满足了相当大的一部分观众既趋于保守又追求新变的观影心理,是好莱坞电影商业与文化结合的又一成功典范。
text: 文化与商业结合的典范之作——评电影《阿凡达》的成功模式 电影《阿凡达》在全球获得的成功首先归功于它的艺术水准与好莱坞的成功制作与商业运作。同时《阿凡达》成功地传播了美国人所崇尚的文化价值体现了好莱坞电影文化的巨大包容性表达了对人类文明的质疑和反思满足了相当大的一部分观众既趋于保守又追求新变的观影心理是好莱坞电影商业与文化结合的又一成功典范。
en_title: A model of the combination of culture and business——Comment on the successful model of the movie "Avatar"
en_abstract: The global success of the movie "Avatar" is first attributed to its artistic level and Hollywood's successful production and commercial operation. At the same time, "Avatar" successfully spreads the cultural values that Americans admire, embodies the huge inclusiveness of Hollywood film culture, expresses questions and reflections on human civilization, and satisfies a considerable part of the audience who are both conservative and pursuing. The newly changed movie-watching psychology is another successful example of the combination of business and culture in Hollywood movies.

title: 神经外科术后继发癫痫患者应用丙戊酸钠的血药浓度监测分析
abstract: 目的通过追踪某院神经外科术后继发癫痫住院患者使用丙戊酸钠用药治疗过程,对丙戊酸钠在神经外科术后继发癫痫患者的使用进行分析、评价,以期为合理用药提供理论参考依据。方法采用回顾性调查分析,利用HIS抽取2017年1月～2018年12月189例神经外科术后应用丙戊酸钠的癫痫患者的归档住院病历,以Excel表进行统计分析,主要包括患者一般信息(出院诊断、性别、年龄),丙戊酸钠应用信息(用法用量、给药方式、用药时间、开始用药时间、停用药物时间及药物相互作用)及丙戊酸钠血药浓度监测信息等。结果通过对某院神经外科189例术后继发癫痫患者应用丙戊酸钠血药浓度监测269例次进行回顾性调查研究,发现患者性别、年龄、联合用药、不良反应等对丙戊酸钠血药浓度均有不同程度的影响。结论丙戊酸钠血药有效浓度范围较窄,不良反应较大,且影响丙戊酸钠血液浓度因素较多,对神经外科术后继发癫痫患者应用丙戊酸钠时,应加强丙戊酸钠血药浓度监测,实施个体化给药,保证用药安全。
text: 神经外科术后继发癫痫患者应用丙戊酸钠的血药浓度监测分析 目的通过追踪某院神经外科术后继发癫痫住院患者使用丙戊酸钠用药治疗过程对丙戊酸钠在神经外科术后继发癫痫患者的使用进行分析、评价以期为合理用药提供理论参考依据。方法采用回顾性调查分析利用his抽取2017年1月～2018年12月189例神经外科术后应用丙戊酸钠的癫痫患者的归档住院病历以excel表进行统计分析主要包括患者一般信息出院诊断、性别、年龄丙戊酸钠应用信息用法用量、给药方式、用药时间、开始用药时间、停用药物时间及药物相互作用及丙戊酸钠血药浓度监测信息等。结果通过对某院神经外科189例术后继发癫痫患者应用丙戊酸钠血药浓度监测269例次进行回顾性调查研究发现患者性别、年龄、联合用药、不良反应等对丙戊酸钠血药浓度均有不同程度的影响。结论丙戊酸钠血药有效浓度范围较窄不良反应较大且影响丙戊酸钠血液浓度因素较多对神经外科术后继发癫痫患者应用丙戊酸钠时应加强丙戊酸钠血药浓度监测实施个体化给药保证用药安全。
en_title: Monitoring and analysis of blood concentration of sodium valproate in patients with epilepsy after neurosurgery
en_abstract: Objective To analyze and evaluate the use of sodium valproate in patients with secondary epilepsy after neurosurgery by tracking the treatment process of inpatients with epilepsy after neurosurgery in a hospital, in order to provide a theory for rational drug use Reference. Methods Retrospective investigation was used to analyze the archived inpatient medical records of 189 patients with epilepsy who received sodium valproate after neurosurgery from January 2017 to December 2018 by using HIS. (discharge diagnosis, gender, age), application information of sodium valproate (usage and dosage, mode of administration, medication time, start time of medication, time to stop medication and drug interaction) and monitoring information of sodium valproate blood concentration, etc. . Results A retrospective investigation was conducted on 189 patients with postoperative secondary epilepsy in a neurosurgery hospital using 269 cases of sodium valproate blood concentration monitoring. Plasma concentrations have varying degrees of influence. Conclusion The effective concentration range of sodium valproate in blood is narrow, the adverse reactions are large, and there are many factors affecting the blood concentration of sodium valproate. When using sodium valproate in patients with epilepsy after neurosurgery, it should be strengthened. Monitor the blood concentration of sodium sodium, implement individualized dosing, and ensure drug safety.

title: 缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗原发性高血压的临床效果研究
abstract: 目的总结分析原发性高血压患者采用缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗的效果。方法 68例原发性高血压患者,随机分为观察组和对照组,各34例。对照组采用硝苯地平控释片治疗,观察组采用缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗,对比两组治疗前后血压、治疗后临床疗效、治疗期间毒副作用发生情况。结果治疗前两组收缩压、舒张压比较差异无统计学意义(P>0.05);治疗后两组收缩压、舒张压均明显下降,且观察组明显低于对照组,差异均具有统计学意义(P<0.05)。观察组总有效率为94.1%,明显高于对照组的73.5%,差异具有统计学意义(P<0.05)。两组患者治疗期间各毒副作用发生情况比较,差异无统计学意义(P>0.05)。结论缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗原发性高血压效果显著,安全性高,能够更好地降低患者血压。
text: 缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗原发性高血压的临床效果研究 目的总结分析原发性高血压患者采用缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗的效果。方法 68例原发性高血压患者随机分为观察组和对照组各34例。对照组采用硝苯地平控释片治疗观察组采用缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗对比两组治疗前后血压、治疗后临床疗效、治疗期间毒副作用发生情况。结果治疗前两组收缩压、舒张压比较差异无统计学意义p005治疗后两组收缩压、舒张压均明显下降且观察组明显低于对照组差异均具有统计学意义p005。观察组总有效率为941明显高于对照组的735差异具有统计学意义p005。两组患者治疗期间各毒副作用发生情况比较差异无统计学意义p005。结论缬沙坦联合硝苯地平控释片治疗原发性高血压效果显著安全性高能够更好地降低患者血压。
en_title: Clinical effect of valsartan combined with nifedipine controlled-release tablets in the treatment of essential hypertension
en_abstract: Objective To summarize and analyze the effect of valsartan combined with nifedipine controlled-release tablets in the treatment of patients with essential hypertension. Methods Sixty-eight patients with essential hypertension were randomly divided into an observation group and a control group, 34 cases in each. The control group was treated with nifedipine controlled-release tablets, and the observation group was treated with valsartan combined with nifedipine controlled-release tablets. Results There was no significant difference in systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure between the two groups before treatment (P>0.05). (P<0.05). The total effective rate in the observation group was 94.1%, which was significantly higher than 73.5% in the control group, and the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05). There was no significant difference in the occurrence of toxic and side effects between the two groups during treatment (P>0.05). Conclusion Valsartan combined with nifedipine controlled-release tablets has significant effect and high safety in the treatment of essential hypertension, and can better reduce blood pressure in patients.

title: 美国电科院(EPRI)与国际原子能机构(IAEA)合作研究核电安全问题
abstract: <正>EPRI与IAEA签署协议,旨在加强核电运行及安全方面的合作,以促进核电发展,具体包括:(1)对日本福岛核电事故的后风险及安全性评估;(2)核电站老化及材料退化性研究;(3)数字测量与控制技术的进一步开放;(4)核电废物的定性与排放技术的研究;(5)新型核资料技术的开发;(6)探讨如何帮助新近使用核电的所有者或希望发展核电的国家建设及发展核电站。
text: 美国电科院epri与国际原子能机构iaea合作研究核电安全问题 正epri与iaea签署协议旨在加强核电运行及安全方面的合作以促进核电发展具体包括1对日本福岛核电事故的后风险及安全性评估2核电站老化及材料退化性研究3数字测量与控制技术的进一步开放4核电废物的定性与排放技术的研究5新型核资料技术的开发6探讨如何帮助新近使用核电的所有者或希望发展核电的国家建设及发展核电站。
en_title: The Electric Power Research Institute (EPRI) cooperates with the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) to study nuclear power safety issues
en_abstract: <Positive> EPRI and IAEA signed an agreement to strengthen cooperation in nuclear power operation and safety to promote nuclear power development, including: (1) Post-risk and safety assessment of the Fukushima nuclear power accident in Japan; (2) Aging nuclear power plants (3) Further opening of digital measurement and control technology; (4) Research on nuclear power waste characterization and discharge technology; (5) Development of new nuclear data technology; (6) Discussion on how to help new nuclear power use Owners of nuclear power plants or countries wishing to develop nuclear power to build and develop nuclear power plants.

title: 如何成为世界文学？——“椭圆折射”理论与中国古诗海外传播
abstract: 达姆罗什提出的＂椭圆折射＂世界文学理论,最大限度地剥离了西方经验与世界文学根本原则之间的必然联系,充分考虑了世界各区域文学发展的历史经验;它把民族文学通过折射进入世界文学空间看成必然,把世界文学看成原语文化与宿主文化的混合物,为民族文学成为世界文学描绘了清晰的路径。这一理论有助于克服中国文学进入世界文学空间时遇到的原作本质主义阻碍,对促进中国文学海外传播具有重要的价值。闻一多认为小畑薰良的英译唐诗把灵芝变成了黑菌,是对原作的亵渎,这是原作本质主义的典型体现。而事实上,正是大量这一类英译中国古诗,在异文化空间里蓬勃生长,增强了世界文学的中国性。
text: 如何成为世界文学？——“椭圆折射”理论与中国古诗海外传播 达姆罗什提出的＂椭圆折射＂世界文学理论最大限度地剥离了西方经验与世界文学根本原则之间的必然联系充分考虑了世界各区域文学发展的历史经验它把民族文学通过折射进入世界文学空间看成必然把世界文学看成原语文化与宿主文化的混合物为民族文学成为世界文学描绘了清晰的路径。这一理论有助于克服中国文学进入世界文学空间时遇到的原作本质主义阻碍对促进中国文学海外传播具有重要的价值。闻一多认为小畑薰良的英译唐诗把灵芝变成了黑菌是对原作的亵渎这是原作本质主义的典型体现。而事实上正是大量这一类英译中国古诗在异文化空间里蓬勃生长增强了世界文学的中国性。
en_title: How to become world literature? ——The Theory of "Elliptical Refraction" and the Overseas Dissemination of Chinese Ancient Poems
en_abstract: The "ellipse refraction" theory of world literature proposed by Damroche strips away the inevitable connection between Western experience and the fundamental principles of world literature to the greatest extent, and fully considers the historical experience of literary development in various regions of the world; it refracts national literature through refraction. It is inevitable to enter the space of world literature, and to regard world literature as a mixture of the original language culture and the host culture, it has drawn a clear path for national literature to become world literature. This theory helps to overcome the original essentialism obstacles encountered when Chinese literature enters the world literature space, and has important value in promoting the overseas dissemination of Chinese literature. Wen Yiduo thinks that Kaoryo Obata's English translation of Tang poetry turns Ganoderma lucidum into black fungus, which is a blasphemy to the original work, which is a typical manifestation of the essentialism of the original work. In fact, it is a large number of such English-translated Chinese ancient poems that flourish in the space of different cultures and enhance the Chinese character of world literature.

title: 精细化护理干预在慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭中的临床价值
abstract: 目的:分析精细化护理干预在慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭中的临床价值。方法:选取我院慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭患者66例,于2019年2月-2019年12月入院治疗,依据护理方法分为对照组(n=33,常规护理)与观察组(n=33,精细化护理),比较两组患者护理满意度及生活质量。结果:观察组护理满意度高于对照组(P<0.05);观察组身体健康、生理功能、精神健康、社会功能均高于对照组(P<0.05)。结论:对慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭患者实施精细化护理,可有效改善患者生活质量,提高护理满意度,值得推广。
text: 精细化护理干预在慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭中的临床价值 目的分析精细化护理干预在慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭中的临床价值。方法选取我院慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭患者66例于2019年2月2019年12月入院治疗依据护理方法分为对照组n33常规护理与观察组n33精细化护理比较两组患者护理满意度及生活质量。结果观察组护理满意度高于对照组p005观察组身体健康、生理功能、精神健康、社会功能均高于对照组p005。结论对慢阻肺急性加重期合并呼吸衰竭患者实施精细化护理可有效改善患者生活质量提高护理满意度值得推广。
en_title: Clinical value of refined nursing intervention in patients with acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease complicated by respiratory failure
en_abstract: Objective: To analyze the clinical value of refined nursing intervention in acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease complicated with respiratory failure. Methods: A total of 66 patients with acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease complicated with respiratory failure in our hospital were selected and admitted for treatment from February 2019 to December 2019. According to the nursing methods, they were divided into the control group (n=33, routine nursing) and the observation group (n=33). n=33, meticulous nursing), and compared the nursing satisfaction and quality of life of the two groups of patients. Results: The nursing satisfaction of the observation group was higher than that of the control group (P<0.05); the physical health, physiological function, mental health and social function of the observation group were higher than those of the control group (P<0.05). Conclusion: Implementing refined nursing for patients with acute exacerbation of COPD combined with respiratory failure can effectively improve the quality of life of patients and improve nursing satisfaction, which is worthy of promotion.

title: 血必净对重度烧伤患儿早期各器官功能的保护及拮抗应激的研究
abstract:
目的：探讨血必净在重度烧伤小儿休克期治疗中对各器官功能的保护及早期拮抗应激的研究。
方法：将102例重度烧伤患儿随机分为血必净治疗组(n=51)和常规治疗组(n=51)。血必净治疗组入院当天起在常规治疗基础上每日用生理盐水(0.9%)100ml配用血必净50ml静脉滴注,每8小时一次，连续用两至三周，治疗期间同常规治疗组,入院当天及伤后48小时后采血，进行血常规，动脉血气分析、生化全套、凝血四项、心肌酶谱等检查。同时进行C-反应蛋白(CRP)、白介素-6(IL-6)、肿瘤坏死因子-α(TNF-α)、皮质醇(Cor)、二胺氧化酶(DAO)、内毒素(LPS)及应激性溃疡的表现指标如呕血，黑便等的监测，必要时行胃镜检查，进行统计分析结果。
结果：血必净组较实验组，所监测的各项指标在入院前基本相同，入院48小时后血必净治疗组各项监测指标包括血常规，生化全套，凝血四项，心肌酶谱，血气分析等检查等重要脏器功能的指标都有明显改善。同时进行C-反应蛋白(CRP)、白介素-6(IL-6)、肿瘤坏死因子-α(TNF-α)、皮质醇(Cor)、二胺氧化酶(DAO)、内毒素(LPS)等均下调明显、低于对照组(P均＜0．05)。
结论：重度烧伤患儿早期应用血必净治疗，可以明显下调各种炎性分子水平，保护各脏器功能。
重度烧伤患儿早期应用血必净治疗，可明显减轻早期应激反应,对早期应激有拮抗作用。
烧伤患儿早期应用血必净治疗，可明显减轻早期应激反应，但尚不认对应激性溃疡发生率有差异。
