en_title: Study on the protection and antagonism of Xuebijing on early organ function in children with severe burns
en_abstract:
OBJECTIVE: To investigate Xuebijing's protection of various organ functions and early antagonism of stress in the treatment of severe burn children in shock stage.
Methods: 102 children with severe burns were randomly divided into Xuebijing treatment group (n=51) and conventional treatment group (n=51). The Xuebijing treatment group received 100ml of normal saline (0.9%) and 50ml of Xuebijing by intravenous drip every 8 hours on the basis of routine treatment from the day of admission. In the group, blood was collected on the day of admission and 48 hours after injury, and routine blood tests, arterial blood gas analysis, complete set of biochemical tests, four items of coagulation, and myocardial enzymes were performed. At the same time, C-reactive protein (CRP), interleukin-6 (IL-6), tumor necrosis factor-α (TNF-α), cortisol (Cor), diamine oxidase (DAO), endotoxin (LPS) and The performance indicators of stress ulcer such as hematemesis, melena, etc. are monitored, gastroscopy is performed if necessary, and the results are statistically analyzed.
Results: Compared with the experimental group, the monitored indicators in the Xuebijing group were basically the same before admission. After 48 hours of admission, the monitoring indicators in the Xuebijing treatment group included blood routine, biochemical complete set, coagulation four items, myocardial enzyme spectrum, Blood gas analysis and other examinations and other important organ function indicators have improved significantly. At the same time, C-reactive protein (CRP), interleukin-6 (IL-6), tumor necrosis factor-α (TNF-α), cortisol (Cor), diamine oxidase (DAO), endotoxin (LPS), etc. Both were significantly down-regulated, lower than the control group (P<0.05).
Conclusion: Early application of Xuebijing in severely burned children can significantly reduce the levels of various inflammatory molecules and protect the function of various organs.
Early application of Xuebijing in severely burned children can significantly reduce the early stress response and have an antagonistic effect on early stress.
Early application of Xuebijing treatment in burn children can significantly reduce the early stress response, but it is not recognized that there is a difference in the incidence of stress ulcers.

title: 音有魂 乐依心——感受、诠释、判断音乐的第三要素“相关体”
abstract: 传统的音乐实践是作曲家的一度创作、表演者的二度创作和欣赏者的三度创作之间围绕一个中心——音乐作品。这种停留在生理感知和物理现象阶段的固定思维模式，不利于对作品感受、判断、诠释的自由和自主。特别不能忽视的是欣赏者对与作品相关的一切因素给予同等的关照。本文提出“相关体”的命题，旨在揭示感受、诠释、判断音乐时除作品的客观性和音乐实践者的主观性以外，与其相关的因素则是人们理解作品的关键。
text: 音有魂 乐依心——感受、诠释、判断音乐的第三要素“相关体” 传统的音乐实践是作曲家的一度创作、表演者的二度创作和欣赏者的三度创作之间围绕一个中心——音乐作品。这种停留在生理感知和物理现象阶段的固定思维模式，不利于对作品感受、判断、诠释的自由和自主。特别不能忽视的是欣赏者对与作品相关的一切因素给予同等的关照。本文提出“相关体”的命题，旨在揭示感受、诠释、判断音乐时除作品的客观性和音乐实践者的主观性以外，与其相关的因素则是人们理解作品的关键。
en_title: Sound has soul, music depends on heart - the third element of feeling, interpreting and judging music, "correlated body"
en_abstract: The traditional music practice is that there is a center between the composer's first creation, the performer's second creation and the appreciator's third creation - the musical work. This fixed mode of thinking that stays at the stage of physiological perception and physical phenomena is not conducive to the freedom and autonomy of the work's perception, judgment, and interpretation. In particular, it cannot be ignored that the appreciator gives equal attention to all factors related to the work. This paper puts forward the proposition of "correlative body", which aims to reveal that in addition to the objectivity of the work and the subjectivity of the music practitioners when feeling, interpreting, and judging music, the related factors are the key to people's understanding of the work.

title: 16排螺旋CT结肠成像技术对结肠、直肠肿瘤的应用价值(附41例报告)
abstract: <正>结肠癌是胃肠道中常见的恶性肿瘤,在欧美国家为导致死亡的第二大恶性肿瘤[1],在我国结肠癌发病率也逐年增高。随着多层螺旋CT(Multlicecomputed tomography,MSCT)的发展和普及,CT结肠成像(Computed tomography colonography,CTC)越来越广泛应用于临床,本研究旨在分析CTC技术在结、直肠肿瘤诊断中的应用价值及检查方法。
text: 16排螺旋ct结肠成像技术对结肠、直肠肿瘤的应用价值附41例报告 正结肠癌是胃肠道中常见的恶性肿瘤在欧美国家为导致死亡的第二大恶性肿瘤1在我国结肠癌发病率也逐年增高。随着多层螺旋ctmultlicecomputed tomographymsct的发展和普及ct结肠成像computed tomography colonographyctc越来越广泛应用于临床本研究旨在分析ctc技术在结、直肠肿瘤诊断中的应用价值及检查方法。
en_title: Application value of 16-slice spiral CT colonography in colon and rectal tumors (report of 41 cases)
en_abstract: <Positive> Colon cancer is a common malignant tumor in the gastrointestinal tract, and is the second leading cause of death in Europe and the United States [1]. The incidence of colon cancer in my country is also increasing year by year. With the development and popularization of Multislice computed tomography (MSCT), CT colonography (Computed tomography colonography, CTC) is more and more widely used in clinical practice. This study aims to analyze the application of CTC technology in the diagnosis of colorectal tumors Application value and inspection methods.

title: “2015中国国际造纸科技展览会及会议”将于9月16～18日在北京举行
abstract: <正>本刊讯由中国造纸协会、中国造纸学会和中国制浆造纸研究院共同主办的"2015中国国际造纸科技展览会及会议"将于2015年9月16~18日在北京全国农业展览馆举行。展览面积13 000 m2,内容涵盖制浆造纸机械设备、零部件、辅助器材、自动化设备及仪器仪表;各类商品纸浆、纸及纸板;废纸及废纸利用技术、设备等;造纸化学品;环保及综合利用新技术及设备;特种纸原料及设备等。
text: “2015中国国际造纸科技展览会及会议”将于9月16～18日在北京举行 正本刊讯由中国造纸协会、中国造纸学会和中国制浆造纸研究院共同主办的2015中国国际造纸科技展览会及会议将于2015年9月1618日在北京全国农业展览馆举行。展览面积13 000 m2内容涵盖制浆造纸机械设备、零部件、辅助器材、自动化设备及仪器仪表各类商品纸浆、纸及纸板废纸及废纸利用技术、设备等造纸化学品环保及综合利用新技术及设备特种纸原料及设备等。
en_title: "2015 China International Paper Technology Exhibition and Conference" will be held in Beijing from September 16 to 18
en_abstract: <Positive> News from this publication, "2015 China International Paper Technology Exhibition and Conference" co-sponsored by China Paper Association, China Paper Society and China Pulp and Paper Research Institute will be held at the National Agricultural Exhibition in Beijing from September 16 to 18, 2015 Hall held. The exhibition area is 13 000 m2, covering pulp and paper machinery and equipment, spare parts, auxiliary equipment, automation equipment and instruments; various commodity pulp, paper and cardboard; waste paper and waste paper utilization technology and equipment, etc.; papermaking chemicals; Environmental protection and comprehensive utilization of new technologies and equipment; special paper raw materials and equipment, etc.

title: 江苏夏季逐月高温日数与西太平洋海温场相关分析及预测模型建立
abstract: 夏季高温的发生是多个因子共同作用的综合反映，其中大气环流背景对高温的出现起到重要作用，而根据海气相互作用的研究，海温变化和大气环流之间有一定相关关系，决定了海温对陆上温度具有一定的可预报性。基于此原理基础，本文利用19782007年30年西太平洋海温和江苏各区域的高温日数资料，运用区域平均方法、场相关分析法，探讨了与江苏不同地区区域平均高温日数相关的强信号海区，分析了利用海温进行逐月高温日数预报的可能性。然后运用最优化相关处理技术将西太平洋海温作为长期预报因子，建立了江苏不同区域夏季逐月高温日数长期预测模型，模型均通过了alpha=0.01显著性水平检验，拟合效果理想，同时并进行了实际预报试验，预报效果较好，可以投入业务使用。此研究对江苏高温的长期预报及高温灾害服务具有重要指导意义。
text: 江苏夏季逐月高温日数与西太平洋海温场相关分析及预测模型建立 夏季高温的发生是多个因子共同作用的综合反映，其中大气环流背景对高温的出现起到重要作用，而根据海气相互作用的研究，海温变化和大气环流之间有一定相关关系，决定了海温对陆上温度具有一定的可预报性。基于此原理基础，本文利用19782007年30年西太平洋海温和江苏各区域的高温日数资料，运用区域平均方法、场相关分析法，探讨了与江苏不同地区区域平均高温日数相关的强信号海区，分析了利用海温进行逐月高温日数预报的可能性。然后运用最优化相关处理技术将西太平洋海温作为长期预报因子，建立了江苏不同区域夏季逐月高温日数长期预测模型，模型均通过了alpha001显著性水平检验，拟合效果理想，同时并进行了实际预报试验，预报效果较好，可以投入业务使用。此研究对江苏高温的长期预报及高温灾害服务具有重要指导意义。
en_title: Correlation analysis of monthly high temperature days in Jiangsu and western Pacific SST field and establishment of prediction model
en_abstract: The occurrence of high temperature in summer is a comprehensive reflection of the combined action of multiple factors. Among them, the background of atmospheric circulation plays an important role in the occurrence of high temperature. SST has a certain predictability on land temperature. Based on this principle, this paper uses the data of high temperature days in the western Pacific Ocean and various regions in Jiangsu for 30 years from 1978 to 2007, and uses the regional average method and field correlation analysis method to discuss the strong signal sea areas related to the regional average high temperature days in different regions of Jiangsu. The possibility of using SST to forecast the monthly high temperature days. Then, using the optimal correlation processing technology to take the western Pacific SST as a long-term predictor, a long-term prediction model for the monthly high temperature days in different regions of Jiangsu was established. The models all passed the alpha=0.01 significance level test. The actual forecast test has been carried out, and the forecast effect is good, and it can be put into business use. This study has important guiding significance for the long-term forecast of high temperature in Jiangsu and the service of high temperature disasters.

title: 基于增量包法的耕地质量年度更新评价研究——以湖南省湘乡市为例
abstract: 依据《农用地质量分等规程》,以湘乡市2014年度变更调查数据及2013年耕地质量等别评价结果为基础,在Arc GIS10.2操作平台上基于增量包法提取质量突变耕地,并对突变耕地进行耕地质量评价,形成2014年度湘乡市耕地质量等别年度更新评价成果。针对变化耕地的面积和质量变化趋势进行分析,并提出湘乡市耕地利用与保护建议。
text: 基于增量包法的耕地质量年度更新评价研究——以湖南省湘乡市为例 依据《农用地质量分等规程》以湘乡市2014年度变更调查数据及2013年耕地质量等别评价结果为基础在arc gis102操作平台上基于增量包法提取质量突变耕地并对突变耕地进行耕地质量评价形成2014年度湘乡市耕地质量等别年度更新评价成果。针对变化耕地的面积和质量变化趋势进行分析并提出湘乡市耕地利用与保护建议。
en_title: Research on annual update evaluation of cultivated land quality based on incremental package method——Taking Xiangxiang City, Hunan Province as an example
en_abstract: According to the "Grading Regulations on the Quality of Agricultural Land", based on the change survey data of Xiangxiang City in 2014 and the evaluation results of the quality of cultivated land in 2013, the quality-mutated cultivated land was extracted based on the incremental package method on the Arc GIS10. The cultivated land quality evaluation was carried out on the mutant cultivated land, and the annual update evaluation results of the cultivated land quality in Xiangxiang City in 2014 were formed. According to the analysis of the change trend of the area and quality of the changed cultivated land, and put forward suggestions on the utilization and protection of cultivated land in Xiangxiang City.

title: 证券市场内幕交易的识别与防控——基于我国法律框架下的路径分析
abstract: 有效识别和防控内幕交易对维护资本市场的健康发展具有重要现实意义。只要内幕信息知情人或者非法获取内幕信息人在内幕信息敏感期内从事或者明示、暗示他人从事,或者泄露内幕信息导致他人从事了与该内幕信息有关的证券交易活动,内幕交易行为即告成立。本文提出的"五步锁定法"识别系统可以有效地识别内幕交易行为。加强内幕信息知情人的管理、提高对内幕信息传播途径的取证能力、增强对内幕交易的监管力量以及加大对内幕交易的处罚执行力度等措施构成了有效防止内幕交易行为发生的防控体系。
text: 证券市场内幕交易的识别与防控——基于我国法律框架下的路径分析 有效识别和防控内幕交易对维护资本市场的健康发展具有重要现实意义。只要内幕信息知情人或者非法获取内幕信息人在内幕信息敏感期内从事或者明示、暗示他人从事或者泄露内幕信息导致他人从事了与该内幕信息有关的证券交易活动内幕交易行为即告成立。本文提出的五步锁定法识别系统可以有效地识别内幕交易行为。加强内幕信息知情人的管理、提高对内幕信息传播途径的取证能力、增强对内幕交易的监管力量以及加大对内幕交易的处罚执行力度等措施构成了有效防止内幕交易行为发生的防控体系。
en_title: The identification and prevention of insider trading in securities market——Based on the path analysis under the legal framework of our country
en_abstract: Effective identification and prevention of insider trading is of great practical significance for maintaining the healthy development of the capital market. As long as the insider of the inside information or the person who illegally obtained the inside information engaged in or expressly or implied that others engaged in the inside information sensitive period, or leaked the inside information to cause others to engage in the securities trading activities related to the inside information, the insider trading behavior was established. The "five-step locking method" identification system proposed in this paper can effectively identify insider trading behavior. Measures such as strengthening the management of insiders of insider information, improving the ability to obtain evidence on the channels of insider information dissemination, strengthening the supervision of insider trading, and strengthening the enforcement of penalties for insider trading constitute a prevention and control system that effectively prevents the occurrence of insider trading.

title: 基于顾客的服装品牌竞争力模糊综合评价模型——以美特斯·邦威为例
abstract: 服装品牌竞争力的强弱很大程度上取决于消费者的价值感知。结合顾客价值理论,构建了服装品牌竞争力模糊综合评价模型,并将其运用到美特斯.邦威服装品牌竞争力的评价上。该模型能帮助服装企业对其品牌竞争力进行更科学的评价,从而为其产品品牌竞争力提升提供理论依据。
text: 基于顾客的服装品牌竞争力模糊综合评价模型——以美特斯·邦威为例 服装品牌竞争力的强弱很大程度上取决于消费者的价值感知。结合顾客价值理论构建了服装品牌竞争力模糊综合评价模型并将其运用到美特斯邦威服装品牌竞争力的评价上。该模型能帮助服装企业对其品牌竞争力进行更科学的评价从而为其产品品牌竞争力提升提供理论依据。
en_title: The Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation Model of Clothing Brand Competitiveness Based on Customers——Taking Meters Bonwe as an Example
en_abstract: The strength of clothing brand competitiveness depends to a large extent on consumers' value perception. Combined with the theory of customer value, the fuzzy comprehensive evaluation model of clothing brand competitiveness is constructed, and it is applied to the evaluation of the clothing brand competitiveness of Meters & Bonwe. The model can help clothing enterprises to evaluate their brand competitiveness more scientifically, so as to provide a theoretical basis for the promotion of their product brand competitiveness.

title: 高糖对人脐静脉内皮细胞sFlt-1、LOX-1表达的影响以及茶多酚的干预作用
abstract:
目的：目前糖尿病的主要慢性并发症涉及心脏、视网膜、肾脏、足及神经都和血管损伤有关。糖尿病血管病变的发病机制主要有蛋白激酶（protein kinase PKC）的激活，糖基化终末产物的堆积，多元醇代谢通路异常，氧化应激学说，炎症反应，多种细胞因子参与等等。氧化应激学说是目前比较公认的发病机制之一，而且趋向认为氧化应激很可能是上述机制的始动因素。高糖刺激下氧自由基清除能力下降，导致氧化产物堆积，氧化应激可能引起PKC激活，糖基化产物增加，多元醇通路等多条代谢途径异常。血管病变的发生涉及多因素关联作用的结果，但血管内皮细胞损伤则是关键靶细胞。糖尿病患者的血管在缺氧和高糖状态下均可促进血管内皮生长因子(vascular endothelial growth factor,VEGF)的产生，从而引起血管内皮细胞的增生及新生血管形成。因此，VEGF在糖尿病血管病变的发病过程中具有十分重要的作用。可溶性血管内皮生成因子受体1(soluble fms-like tyrosine kinase-1, sFlt-1)是脐静脉内皮细胞表达的一种VEGF的相应的结合受体，它通过与血管内皮细胞表面的受体竞争性结合VEGF，阻断其生物学活性，可抑制血管内皮细胞的增生和新生血管的形成。蔡海瑞等人的研究证实，人脐静脉内皮细胞(human umbilical veinendothelial cell，HUVEC)也可表达sFlt-1，但目前关于sFlt-1的研究主要集中在糖尿病视网膜病变，sFlt-1在糖尿病周围血管病变中是否也存在相似的作用目前研究极少。另外内皮细胞损伤也可使血浆的低密度脂蛋白透过损伤的内皮细胞集聚在内皮下间隙并被氧化，引起内皮细胞活化，氧化型低密度脂蛋白(ox-LDL)导致内皮功能障碍，泡沫细胞形成从而引发动脉粥样硬化，Sawamura等在1997年发现新型内皮细胞ox-LDL特异受体，即血凝素样氧化低密度脂蛋白受体1(Lectin-like oxidized low-density lipoproteinreceptor-1(LOX-1)，介导ox-LDL的生物学活性，在AS中发挥重要作用，从而引发血管病变，但在高糖环境下是否可引起内皮细胞表达LOX-1增多，目前国内外报道较少。茶多酚作为一种广泛的抗氧化剂，对脐静脉内皮细胞也不例外。陈露露等人的研究已证实茶多酚能有效抑制高糖所致内皮细胞氧化损伤。分裂原激活的蛋白激酶(mitogen activated proteinkinases，MAPK)家族是非常保守的丝氨酸/苏氨酸蛋白激酶，是信号转导过程中一组主要的信号分子，在发育和疾病发生过程中起重要作用。该家族有4个成员，即细胞外信号调节激酶(extracellular regulated protein kinasel/2，ERK1/2)，c-jun N端激酶(c-jun N-terminal kinase，JNK)/应急激活的蛋白激酶(stre activated protein kinase，SAPK)，p38MAPK，ERK5/BMK1(bigmitogen-activated protein kinase，BMKl)。p38蛋白激酶是由Han等用内毒素刺激哺乳动物细胞，从中分离纯化的酪氨酸磷酸蛋白激酶。p38是MAPK家族控制炎症反应最重要的成员，它可因生理性应激、脂多糖、渗透性应激和紫外线照射而激活。本实验通过不同浓度的茶多酚及p38MAPK抑制剂SB203580作用于高糖体外培养HUVEC细胞48小时，观察sFlt-1、LOX-1的表达活性，探讨高糖引起sFlt-1、LOX-1表达变化的机制以及茶多酚的保护作用，以及上述指标是否通过p38MAPK信号通路表达，有可能为糖尿病血管病变的预防和治疗找到新的途径。
方法：提取新生儿脐带，经过胰酶消化后获取脐静脉内皮细胞，原代培养，达80%以上融合时予以传代培养，采用3-5代细胞用于下一步实验。选取生长状态良好的对数期细胞入组。实验分为15组：正常对照组（glucose5.5mmol/L，DMEM培养液），高糖组（glucose30mmol/L，DMEM培养液），茶多酚（TP）干预组：浓度分别为10mg/L、20mg/L、30mg/L，p38MAPK抑制剂组SB203580浓度分别为10μmol/L、15μmol/L、20μmol/L，分别加入正常对照组及高糖组，高渗组（甘露醇浓度24.5mmol/L+葡萄糖浓度5.5mmol/L），除高渗对照组外，各药物组均在高糖处理前30分钟分别加入药物，每组4孔细胞，加入药物后继续培养48小时后，观察HUVEC细胞的形态，MTT法检测生存活力，RT-PCR及Elisa法分别检测sFlt-1及LOX-1mRNA表达水平及sFlt-1蛋白表达量。
结果：
1同正常对照组相比，甘露醇组细胞活性虽然有所降低，但是没有统计学差异（P＞0.05）；正常+茶多酚组同正常对照组相比，10mg/L浓度组细胞活性降低，30mg/L浓度组细胞活性明显升高，差异均有统计学意义(P＜0.05)，20mg/L浓度组细胞活性同正常对照组无明显差异（P＞0.05）；高糖组的细胞活性则明显受到抑制，差异有统计学意义（P＜0.05）；以不同浓度的茶多酚进行干预，发现各个浓度组较高糖组均有统计学差异（P＜0.05）。（Table1）与单纯高糖组比，HG+10mg/L TP组细胞活力下降（P＜0.05），HG+20mg/L TP组细胞活力活力升高但仍低于正常对照组（P＜0.05），HG+30mg/L TP组细胞活力较单纯高糖组明显升高（P＜0.05），但较正常对照组仍偏低，且差异具有统计学意义。故TP的浓度选择20mg/L（此浓度对正常糖中的细胞活力无影响且能够降低高糖环境对细胞活力影响）为最适实验剂量，作为以下实验的作用浓度。NG+p38MAPK抑制剂(10μmol/L,15μmol/L,20μmol/L)组HUVECs活力均较正常对照组有所降低，但差异无统计学意义（P＞0.05），且三组中以NG+15p38抑制剂组的细胞活力最强，HG+p38抑制剂组(10μmol/L，15μmol/L，20μmol/L)组HUVECs活力均较单纯高糖组升高但仍低于正常对照组（P＜0.05），且三组之间细胞活力无差异，故p38MAPK抑制剂的浓度选择15μmol/L为最佳剂量，以作为以下实验的作用浓度。
2与正常对照组相比，高渗组的sFlt-1mRNA及蛋白含量虽有所降低，但差异无统计学意义（P＞0.05）；高糖组的sFlt-1mRNA及蛋白表达明显减低，差异有统计学意义（P＜0.05）。加入茶多酚干预后，高糖组及正常对照组的表达量均增加，且分别与干预前相比均有统计学差异（P＜0.05）。
3与正常对照组相比，高糖组的LOX-1mRNA表达量增加，差异有统计学意义（P＜0.05）。加入茶多酚干预后，LOX-1mRNA表达均下降，但正常对照组加茶多酚与干预前差异无统计学意义，高糖组加入茶多酚后，差异有统计学意义（P＜0.05）。
4与正常对照组相比，高糖组p38MAPK蛋白浓度增加，差异有统计学意义，加入茶多酚后，其表达量下降，差异有统计学意义。分别与正常对照组及高糖组相比较，加入p38MAPK抑制剂SB203580后，sFlt-1mRNA、蛋白及LOX-1mRNA几乎无表达。
结论：
1高糖环境可以引起脐静脉内皮细胞sFlt-1的表达活性降低，LOX-1含量增加，两者可能在糖尿病血管病变的进程中发挥重要作用。
2茶多酚可以明显降低高糖诱导的脐静脉内皮细胞LOX-1的高表达并上调sFlt-1的表达，减轻高糖对脐静脉内皮细胞的损伤作用，减少动脉硬化的发生及新生血管的形成。
3p38MAPK在高糖环境下可被激活，其抑制剂可明显抑制LOX-1及sFlt-1的表达量，表明高糖诱导的HUVEC的LOX-1及sFlt-1的表达变化可能通过p38MAPK通路。
text: 高糖对人脐静脉内皮细胞sflt1、lox1表达的影响以及茶多酚的干预作用 目的：目前糖尿病的主要慢性并发症涉及心脏、视网膜、肾脏、足及神经都和血管损伤有关。糖尿病血管病变的发病机制主要有蛋白激酶（protein kinase pkc）的激活，糖基化终末产物的堆积，多元醇代谢通路异常，氧化应激学说，炎症反应，多种细胞因子参与等等。氧化应激学说是目前比较公认的发病机制之一，而且趋向认为氧化应激很可能是上述机制的始动因素。高糖刺激下氧自由基清除能力下降，导致氧化产物堆积，氧化应激可能引起pkc激活，糖基化产物增加，多元醇通路等多条代谢途径异常。血管病变的发生涉及多因素关联作用的结果，但血管内皮细胞损伤则是关键靶细胞。糖尿病患者的血管在缺氧和高糖状态下均可促进血管内皮生长因子vascular endothelial growth factorvegf的产生，从而引起血管内皮细胞的增生及新生血管形成。因此，vegf在糖尿病血管病变的发病过程中具有十分重要的作用。可溶性血管内皮生成因子受体1soluble fmslike tyrosine kinase1 sflt1是脐静脉内皮细胞表达的一种vegf的相应的结合受体，它通过与血管内皮细胞表面的受体竞争性结合vegf，阻断其生物学活性，可抑制血管内皮细胞的增生和新生血管的形成。蔡海瑞等人的研究证实，人脐静脉内皮细胞human umbilical veinendothelial cell，huvec也可表达sflt1，但目前关于sflt1的研究主要集中在糖尿病视网膜病变，sflt1在糖尿病周围血管病变中是否也存在相似的作用目前研究极少。另外内皮细胞损伤也可使血浆的低密度脂蛋白透过损伤的内皮细胞集聚在内皮下间隙并被氧化，引起内皮细胞活化，氧化型低密度脂蛋白oxldl导致内皮功能障碍，泡沫细胞形成从而引发动脉粥样硬化，sawamura等在1997年发现新型内皮细胞oxldl特异受体，即血凝素样氧化低密度脂蛋白受体1lectinlike oxidized lowdensity lipoproteinreceptor1lox1，介导oxldl的生物学活性，在as中发挥重要作用，从而引发血管病变，但在高糖环境下是否可引起内皮细胞表达lox1增多，目前国内外报道较少。茶多酚作为一种广泛的抗氧化剂，对脐静脉内皮细胞也不例外。陈露露等人的研究已证实茶多酚能有效抑制高糖所致内皮细胞氧化损伤。分裂原激活的蛋白激酶mitogen activated proteinkinases，mapk家族是非常保守的丝氨酸苏氨酸蛋白激酶，是信号转导过程中一组主要的信号分子，在发育和疾病发生过程中起重要作用。该家族有4个成员，即细胞外信号调节激酶extracellular regulated protein kinasel2，erk12，cjun n端激酶cjun nterminal kinase，jnk应急激活的蛋白激酶stre activated protein kinase，sapk，p38mapk，erk5bmk1bigmitogenactivated protein kinase，bmkl。p38蛋白激酶是由han等用内毒素刺激哺乳动物细胞，从中分离纯化的酪氨酸磷酸蛋白激酶。p38是mapk家族控制炎症反应最重要的成员，它可因生理性应激、脂多糖、渗透性应激和紫外线照射而激活。本实验通过不同浓度的茶多酚及p38mapk抑制剂sb203580作用于高糖体外培养huvec细胞48小时，观察sflt1、lox1的表达活性，探讨高糖引起sflt1、lox1表达变化的机制以及茶多酚的保护作用，以及上述指标是否通过p38mapk信号通路表达，有可能为糖尿病血管病变的预防和治疗找到新的途径。 方法：提取新生儿脐带，经过胰酶消化后获取脐静脉内皮细胞，原代培养，达80以上融合时予以传代培养，采用35代细胞用于下一步实验。选取生长状态良好的对数期细胞入组。实验分为15组：正常对照组（glucose55mmoll，dmem培养液），高糖组（glucose30mmoll，dmem培养液），茶多酚（tp）干预组：浓度分别为10mgl、20mgl、30mgl，p38mapk抑制剂组sb203580浓度分别为10μmoll、15μmoll、20μmoll，分别加入正常对照组及高糖组，高渗组（甘露醇浓度245mmoll葡萄糖浓度55mmoll），除高渗对照组外，各药物组均在高糖处理前30分钟分别加入药物，每组4孔细胞，加入药物后继续培养48小时后，观察huvec细胞的形态，mtt法检测生存活力，rtpcr及elisa法分别检测sflt1及lox1mrna表达水平及sflt1蛋白表达量。 结果： 1同正常对照组相比，甘露醇组细胞活性虽然有所降低，但是没有统计学差异（p＞005）；正常茶多酚组同正常对照组相比，10mgl浓度组细胞活性降低，30mgl浓度组细胞活性明显升高，差异均有统计学意义p＜005，20mgl浓度组细胞活性同正常对照组无明显差异（p＞005）；高糖组的细胞活性则明显受到抑制，差异有统计学意义（p＜005）；以不同浓度的茶多酚进行干预，发现各个浓度组较高糖组均有统计学差异（p＜005）。（table1）与单纯高糖组比，hg10mgl tp组细胞活力下降（p＜005），hg20mgl tp组细胞活力活力升高但仍低于正常对照组（p＜005），hg30mgl tp组细胞活力较单纯高糖组明显升高（p＜005），但较正常对照组仍偏低，且差异具有统计学意义。故tp的浓度选择20mgl（此浓度对正常糖中的细胞活力无影响且能够降低高糖环境对细胞活力影响）为最适实验剂量，作为以下实验的作用浓度。ngp38mapk抑制剂10μmoll15μmoll20μmoll组huvecs活力均较正常对照组有所降低，但差异无统计学意义（p＞005），且三组中以ng15p38抑制剂组的细胞活力最强，hgp38抑制剂组10μmoll，15μmoll，20μmoll组huvecs活力均较单纯高糖组升高但仍低于正常对照组（p＜005），且三组之间细胞活力无差异，故p38mapk抑制剂的浓度选择15μmoll为最佳剂量，以作为以下实验的作用浓度。 2与正常对照组相比，高渗组的sflt1mrna及蛋白含量虽有所降低，但差异无统计学意义（p＞005）；高糖组的sflt1mrna及蛋白表达明显减低，差异有统计学意义（p＜005）。加入茶多酚干预后，高糖组及正常对照组的表达量均增加，且分别与干预前相比均有统计学差异（p＜005）。 3与正常对照组相比，高糖组的lox1mrna表达量增加，差异有统计学意义（p＜005）。加入茶多酚干预后，lox1mrna表达均下降，但正常对照组加茶多酚与干预前差异无统计学意义，高糖组加入茶多酚后，差异有统计学意义（p＜005）。 4与正常对照组相比，高糖组p38mapk蛋白浓度增加，差异有统计学意义，加入茶多酚后，其表达量下降，差异有统计学意义。分别与正常对照组及高糖组相比较，加入p38mapk抑制剂sb203580后，sflt1mrna、蛋白及lox1mrna几乎无表达。 结论： 1高糖环境可以引起脐静脉内皮细胞sflt1的表达活性降低，lox1含量增加，两者可能在糖尿病血管病变的进程中发挥重要作用。 2茶多酚可以明显降低高糖诱导的脐静脉内皮细胞lox1的高表达并上调sflt1的表达，减轻高糖对脐静脉内皮细胞的损伤作用，减少动脉硬化的发生及新生血管的形成。 3p38mapk在高糖环境下可被激活，其抑制剂可明显抑制lox1及sflt1的表达量，表明高糖诱导的huvec的lox1及sflt1的表达变化可能通过p38mapk通路。
en_title: Effects of high glucose on the expression of sFlt-1 and LOX-1 in human umbilical vein endothelial cells and the intervention effect of tea polyphenols
en_abstract:
Objective: The main chronic complications of diabetes involve the heart, retina, kidneys, feet and nerves, all of which are related to vascular damage. The pathogenesis of diabetic vascular disease mainly includes the activation of protein kinase (PKC), the accumulation of glycation end products, the abnormality of polyol metabolic pathway, the theory of oxidative stress, inflammatory response, the participation of various cytokines, etc. The theory of oxidative stress is one of the more recognized pathogenic mechanisms, and it tends to be believed that oxidative stress is likely to be the initiating factor of the above-mentioned mechanism. Oxygen free radical scavenging ability decreases under high glucose stimulation, resulting in accumulation of oxidative products. Oxidative stress may cause PKC activation, increase in glycosylation products, and abnormality of multiple metabolic pathways such as polyol pathway. The occurrence of vascular lesions involves the result of multi-factor correlation, but vascular endothelial cell injury is the key target cell. The blood vessels of diabetic patients can promote the production of vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) under hypoxia and high glucose conditions, thereby causing the proliferation of vascular endothelial cells and the formation of new blood vessels. Therefore, VEGF plays a very important role in the pathogenesis of diabetic vascular disease. Soluble fms-like tyrosine kinase-1 (sFlt-1) is a corresponding binding receptor for VEGF expressed by umbilical vein endothelial cells, which competes with receptors on the surface of vascular endothelial cells Binding to VEGF, blocking its biological activity, can inhibit the proliferation of vascular endothelial cells and the formation of new blood vessels. The study of Cai Hairui et al. confirmed that human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVEC) can also express sFlt-1, but the current research on sFlt-1 is mainly focused on diabetic retinopathy, and sFlt-1 in diabetic peripheral vascular disease Whether there is a similar effect in the current research is very little. In addition, endothelial cell injury can also cause plasma low-density lipoprotein to accumulate in the subendothelial space through damaged endothelial cells and be oxidized, causing endothelial cell activation. Oxidized low-density lipoprotein (ox-LDL) leads to endothelial dysfunction, foaming In 1997, Sawamura et al discovered a new endothelial cell ox-LDL-specific receptor, the hemagglutinin-like oxidized low-density lipoprotein receptor-1 (Lectin-like oxidized low-density lipoprotein receptor-1 ( LOX-1) mediates the biological activity of ox-LDL and plays an important role in AS, thereby causing vascular lesions. However, whether it can cause the increase of LOX-1 expression in endothelial cells in a high-glucose environment is less reported at home and abroad. As a wide range of antioxidants, tea polyphenols are no exception to umbilical vein endothelial cells. The research of Chen Lulu et al. has confirmed that tea polyphenols can effectively inhibit the oxidative damage of endothelial cells caused by high glucose. Mitogen-activated protein kinase ( The mitogen activated proteinkinases (MAPK) family is a very conserved serine/threonine protein kinase, which is a group of major signal molecules in the process of signal transduction and plays an important role in development and disease occurrence. This family has 4 members, Namely extracellular regulated protein kinase (extracellular regulated protein kinase1/2, ERK1/2), c-jun N-terminal kinase (c-jun N-terminal kinase, JNK) / emergency activated protein kinase (stre activated protein kinase, SAPK) , p38MAPK, ERK5/BMK1 (bigmitogen-activated protein kinase, BMK1). p38 protein kinase is a tyrosine phosphoprotein kinase isolated and purified from mammalian cells stimulated by endotoxin by Han et al. p38 is the most important inflammatory response in the MAPK family. It can be activated by physiological stress, lipopolysaccharide, osmotic stress and ultraviolet radiation. In this experiment, different concentrations of tea polyphenols and p38MAPK inhibitor SB203580 acted on HUVEC cells cultured in high glucose for 48 hours. Observing the expression activity of sFlt-1 and LOX-1, and exploring the mechanism of high glucose-induced changes in the expression of sFlt-1 and LOX-1, as well as the protective effect of tea polyphenols, and whether the above indicators are expressed through the p38MAPK signaling pathway, which may be the cause of diabetic vascular disease. Disease prevention and treatment to find new ways.
Methods: The umbilical cord of the newborn was extracted, and the umbilical vein endothelial cells were obtained after trypsin digestion, and the cells were primary cultured. When more than 80% confluent, the cells were subcultured, and the cells of 3-5 passages were used for the next experiment. The log-phase cells with good growth status were selected into the group. The experiment was divided into 15 groups: normal control group (glucose5.5mmol/L, DMEM medium), high glucose group (glucose30mmol/L, DMEM medium), tea polyphenol (TP) intervention group: the concentrations were 10mg/L, 20mg/L, 30mg/L, p38MAPK inhibitor group SB203580 concentration was 10μmol/L, 15μmol/L, 20μmol/L, respectively, added to normal control group, high glucose group, hypertonic group (mannitol concentration 24.5mmol/L + glucose concentration of 5.5mmol/L), except for the hypertonic control group, each drug group was added with drugs 30 minutes before the high-glucose treatment, each group of 4-well cells, and continued to culture for 48 hours after the drug was added to observe the morphology of HUVEC cells. MTT method was used to detect the viability. RT-PCR and Elisa methods were used to detect the mRNA expression levels of sFlt-1 and LOX-1 and the protein expression of sFlt-1, respectively.
result:
1 Compared with the normal control group, the cell activity of the mannitol group decreased, but there was no statistical difference (P>0.05); compared with the normal control group, the cell activity of the normal + tea polyphenol group decreased in the 10 mg/L concentration group. , 30mg/L concentration group cell activity was significantly increased, the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05), 20mg/L concentration group cell activity was not significantly different from the normal control group (P>0.05); cell activity in high glucose group It was significantly inhibited, and the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05). Intervening with tea polyphenols of different concentrations, it was found that there were statistical differences in the higher sugar group in each concentration group (P<0.05). (Table 1) Compared with the high glucose group, the cell viability in the HG+10mg/L TP group decreased (P<0.05), and the cell viability in the HG+20mg/L TP group increased but was still lower than that in the normal control group (P<0.05). , the cell viability of HG+30mg/L TP group was significantly higher than that of pure high glucose group (P<0.05), but still lower than that of normal control group, and the difference was statistically significant. Therefore, 20mg/L of TP concentration (this concentration has no effect on cell viability in normal glucose and can reduce the effect of high glucose environment on cell viability) was selected as the optimum experimental dose as the action concentration in the following experiments. The activity of HUVECs in the NG+p38MAPK inhibitor (10μmol/L, 15μmol/L, 20μmol/L) group was lower than that in the normal control group, but the difference was not statistically significant (P>0.05). The cell viability in the inhibitor group was the strongest, and the viability of HUVECs in the HG+p38 inhibitor group (10 μmol/L, 15 μmol/L, 20 μmol/L) group was higher than that in the high glucose group but still lower than that in the normal control group (P＜0.05). ), and there was no difference in cell viability among the three groups, so 15 μmol/L of p38MAPK inhibitor was selected as the optimal dose, which was used as the action concentration in the following experiments.
2 Compared with the normal control group, the sFlt-1 mRNA and protein contents in the hypertonic group were decreased, but the difference was not statistically significant (P>0.05). Statistical significance (P<0.05). After the intervention of tea polyphenols, the expression levels of the high sugar group and the normal control group were increased, and there were statistical differences compared with those before the intervention (P<0.05).
3 Compared with the normal control group, the expression of LOX-1 mRNA in the high glucose group was increased, and the difference was statistically significant (P<0.05). After the intervention of tea polyphenols, LOX-1 mRNA expression decreased, but there was no significant difference between the normal control group and the pre-intervention. .
4 Compared with the normal control group, the concentration of p38MAPK protein in the high glucose group increased, and the difference was statistically significant. After adding tea polyphenols, its expression decreased, and the difference was statistically significant. Compared with the normal control group and the high glucose group, after adding the p38MAPK inhibitor SB203580, the sFlt-1 mRNA, protein and LOX-1 mRNA were almost not expressed.
in conclusion:
1 High glucose environment can reduce the expression of sFlt-1 and increase the content of LOX-1 in umbilical vein endothelial cells, both of which may play an important role in the process of diabetic vascular disease.
2 Tea polyphenols can significantly reduce the high expression of LOX-1 and up-regulate the expression of sFlt-1 in umbilical vein endothelial cells induced by high glucose, reduce the damage effect of high glucose on umbilical vein endothelial cells, and reduce the occurrence of arteriosclerosis and neovascularization. form.
3p38MAPK can be activated under high glucose environment, and its inhibitor can significantly inhibit the expression of LOX-1 and sFlt-1, indicating that the expression changes of LOX-1 and sFlt-1 in HUVECs induced by high glucose may be through the p38MAPK pathway.

title: 内镜下鼻胆管引流术联合中药治疗急性梗阻性化脓性胆管炎的疗效观察
abstract: 目的:研究内镜下鼻胆管引流术联合中药治疗急性梗阻性化脓性胆管炎的疗效。方法:观察组先采用ENBD术,再行取石术,术后进行中药治疗;对照组先采用ENBD术,择期再行取石术。结果:观察组与对照组的手术治疗效果存在较为明显的差异。其中,观察组患者的临床治愈例数为40例,治愈率为100.00%(40/40);治疗期间观察组未发生患者死亡的现象,患者的平均住院时间为5.5±1.3d。对照组患者的临床治愈例数为32例,治愈率为82.50%(33/40);治疗期间对照组未发生患者死亡的现象,患者的平均住院时间为8.5±2.3d。上述差异具有统计学意义(P<0.05)。结论:ENBD术联合中药治疗AOSC的临床效果优于单一的ENBD治疗方法,应当在临床应用上进行推广。
text: 内镜下鼻胆管引流术联合中药治疗急性梗阻性化脓性胆管炎的疗效观察 目的研究内镜下鼻胆管引流术联合中药治疗急性梗阻性化脓性胆管炎的疗效。方法观察组先采用enbd术再行取石术术后进行中药治疗对照组先采用enbd术择期再行取石术。结果观察组与对照组的手术治疗效果存在较为明显的差异。其中观察组患者的临床治愈例数为40例治愈率为100004040治疗期间观察组未发生患者死亡的现象患者的平均住院时间为55±13d。对照组患者的临床治愈例数为32例治愈率为82503340治疗期间对照组未发生患者死亡的现象患者的平均住院时间为85±23d。上述差异具有统计学意义p005。结论enbd术联合中药治疗aosc的临床效果优于单一的enbd治疗方法应当在临床应用上进行推广。
en_title: Efficacy observation of endoscopic nasobiliary drainage combined with traditional Chinese medicine in the treatment of acute obstructive suppurative cholangitis
en_abstract: Objective: To study the efficacy of endoscopic nasobiliary drainage combined with traditional Chinese medicine in the treatment of acute obstructive suppurative cholangitis. Methods: The observation group was treated with ENBD first, followed by lithotripsy, and then treated with traditional Chinese medicine; the control group was treated with ENBD first, followed by elective lithotripsy. Results: There were obvious differences in the surgical treatment effect between the observation group and the control group. Among them, the number of clinical cures in the observation group was 40, and the cure rate was 100.00% (40/40); no death occurred in the observation group during the treatment period, and the average hospital stay of the patients was 5.5±1.3 days. The number of clinical cures in the control group was 32, the cure rate was 82.50% (33/40); no death occurred in the control group during the treatment period, and the average hospital stay of the patients was 8.5±2.3 days. The above differences were statistically significant (P<0.05). Conclusion: The clinical effect of ENBD combined with traditional Chinese medicine in the treatment of AOSC is better than that of single ENBD treatment, and it should be promoted in clinical application.

title: 古诗删出语文课本又怎样——从小学课本删古诗与“馒头体”获奖说起
text: 古诗删出语文课本又怎样——从小学课本删古诗与“馒头体”获奖说起

title: 铜锈环棱螺对沉积物中重金属的生物积累及其与重金属赋存形态的关系
abstract: 以铜锈环棱螺(Bellamya aeruginosa)为测试生物,采用28d沉积物生物积累试验研究铜锈环棱螺对污染河流沉积物中重金属的生物积累,并探讨其与重金属赋存形态的关系.结果表明:铜锈环棱螺肝胰脏对Cd、Pb、Cu、Cr、Zn和Mn均具有较强的积累作用.不同重金属的积累量存在较大差别,Zn的积累量最多,占重金属总积累量的84.32%±4.36%,其次为Cu,占7.67%±2.84%;Pb、Cr和Mn的比例相对较少,分别为3.62%±1.84%、2.22%±1.03%和1.33%±0.15%;Cd所占比例最少,为0.83%±0.53%.肝胰脏中重金属元素之间的相关性均不显著.肝胰脏金属污染指数与沉积物污染综合指数具有显著的正相关关系,铜锈环棱螺可以作为沉积物重金属污染的监测生物.不同沉积物Cd、Cr、Zn和Mn的生物-沉积物积累因子(BSAF)具有较大的差异,Cu和Pb的BSAF比较稳定.Cd的生物积累与沉积物中Cd的可交换的与酸可溶态及可氧化态显著相关;Pb的生物积累与Pb的可还原态显著相关;Cu的生物积累与Cu的可氧化态显著相关;Mn的生物积累与Mn的可交换的与酸可溶态和可还原态显著相关;Cr和Mn的生物积累与其不同形态和总量均不相关.BSAF不宜作为衡量铜锈环棱螺对沉积物中重金属生物积累能力的指标.
text: 铜锈环棱螺对沉积物中重金属的生物积累及其与重金属赋存形态的关系 以铜锈环棱螺bellamya aeruginosa为测试生物采用28d沉积物生物积累试验研究铜锈环棱螺对污染河流沉积物中重金属的生物积累并探讨其与重金属赋存形态的关系结果表明铜锈环棱螺肝胰脏对cd、pb、cu、cr、zn和mn均具有较强的积累作用不同重金属的积累量存在较大差别zn的积累量最多占重金属总积累量的8432±436其次为cu占767±284pb、cr和mn的比例相对较少分别为362±184、222±103和133±015cd所占比例最少为083±053肝胰脏中重金属元素之间的相关性均不显著肝胰脏金属污染指数与沉积物污染综合指数具有显著的正相关关系铜锈环棱螺可以作为沉积物重金属污染的监测生物不同沉积物cd、cr、zn和mn的生物沉积物积累因子bsaf具有较大的差异cu和pb的bsaf比较稳定cd的生物积累与沉积物中cd的可交换的与酸可溶态及可氧化态显著相关pb的生物积累与pb的可还原态显著相关cu的生物积累与cu的可氧化态显著相关mn的生物积累与mn的可交换的与酸可溶态和可还原态显著相关cr和mn的生物积累与其不同形态和总量均不相关bsaf不宜作为衡量铜锈环棱螺对沉积物中重金属生物积累能力的指标
en_title: Bioaccumulation of Heavy Metals in Sediments by Pseudomonas patinae and its relationship with the occurrence of heavy metals
en_abstract: Taking Bellamya aeruginosa as the test organism, the 28-day sediment bioaccumulation experiment was used to study the bioaccumulation of heavy metals in polluted river sediments by Bellamya aeruginosa, and to explore the relationship between it and the occurrence form of heavy metals. The results showed that: Cd, Pb, Cu, Cr, Zn, and Mn were strongly accumulated in the hepatopancreas of P. patina. There were great differences in the accumulation of different heavy metals, and the accumulation of Zn was the largest, accounting for 84.32 of the total accumulation of heavy metals. %±4.36%, followed by Cu, accounting for 7.67%±2.84%; the proportions of Pb, Cr and Mn were relatively small, 3.62%±1.84%, 2.22%±1.03% and 1.33%±0.15%, respectively; Cd accounted for The proportion of the hepatopancreas was the least, which was 0.83%±0.53%. The correlation between heavy metal elements in the hepatopancreas was not significant. There was a significant positive correlation between the metal pollution index of the hepatopancreas and the comprehensive index of sediment pollution. Monitoring organisms for heavy metal pollution in sediments. The bio-sediment accumulation factors (BSAF) of Cd, Cr, Zn and Mn in different sediments are quite different, and the BSAF of Cu and Pb is relatively stable. The bioaccumulation of Cd is similar to that in sediments The exchangeability of Cd is significantly related to the acid-soluble and oxidizable state; the bioaccumulation of Pb is significantly related to the reducible state of Pb; the bioaccumulation of Cu is significantly related to the oxidizable state of Cu; the bioaccumulation of Mn is significantly related to the oxidizable state of Mn Exchangeable was significantly correlated with acid-soluble and reducible states; the bioaccumulation of Cr and Mn was not correlated with their different forms and total amounts. BSAF was not suitable as an indicator to measure the bioaccumulation ability of P. patina to heavy metals in sediments.

title: 非物质文化遗产的数字化保护与文化交流研究——以南通蓝印花布为例
abstract: 非物质文化遗产具有灵活、生动与自然等特点,是承载当地文化的最好载体,也是在世界多元文化格局中保持"我们自己的"文化竞争力有效措施之一。如何更好地通过数字化技术对非物质文化进行有效地保护、开发,以及如何更好地通过先进的数字化技术及互联网技术,来开展非物质文化遗产所承载的"我们自己的"文化交流工作,从而实现"我们自己的"文化的跨国界交流与传播,已成为非物质文化遗产数字化领域研究工作的重要方向。
text: 非物质文化遗产的数字化保护与文化交流研究——以南通蓝印花布为例 非物质文化遗产具有灵活、生动与自然等特点是承载当地文化的最好载体也是在世界多元文化格局中保持我们自己的文化竞争力有效措施之一。如何更好地通过数字化技术对非物质文化进行有效地保护、开发以及如何更好地通过先进的数字化技术及互联网技术来开展非物质文化遗产所承载的我们自己的文化交流工作从而实现我们自己的文化的跨国界交流与传播已成为非物质文化遗产数字化领域研究工作的重要方向。
en_title: Research on digital protection and cultural exchange of intangible cultural heritage——Taking Nantong blue print as an example
en_abstract: Intangible cultural heritage has the characteristics of flexibility, vividness and nature, it is the best carrier to carry local culture, and it is also one of the effective measures to maintain "our own" cultural competitiveness in the world's multicultural pattern. How to better protect and develop intangible culture through digital technology, and how to better carry out "our own" cultural exchange work carried by intangible cultural heritage through advanced digital technology and Internet technology, Thus realizing the cross-border communication and dissemination of "our own" culture has become an important direction of research in the field of intangible cultural heritage digitization.

title: 胰岛素联合低分子肝素钙对重症高脂血症性AP患者生化指标和炎性因子的影响
abstract: 目的探究胰岛素联合低分子肝素钙对重症高脂血症性AP患者生化指标和炎性因子的影响。方法选取盐城市第三人民医院2016年7月至2020年1月收治的60例重症高脂血症性AP患者,采用随机数字表法分为对照组与试验组,各30例。两组患者均实施常规治疗,对照组患者行低分子肝素钙治疗,试验组患者在对照组的基础上联合胰岛素治疗,3 d为1个疗程,均治疗4个疗程。比较两组患者的临床疗效,治疗前后血脂水平、血淀粉酶及血清炎性因子水平。结果治疗后试验组患者的临床总有效率高于对照组;与治疗前比,治疗后两组患者总胆固醇、三酰甘油、血淀粉酶水平及血清TNF-α、CRP、IL-6水平均降低,且试验组低于对照组(均P <0.05)。结论胰岛素联合低分子肝素钙可改善重症高脂血症性AP患者血脂和血淀粉酶水平,抑制机体炎症反应,缓解患者临床症状,提高临床疗效。
text: 胰岛素联合低分子肝素钙对重症高脂血症性ap患者生化指标和炎性因子的影响 目的探究胰岛素联合低分子肝素钙对重症高脂血症性ap患者生化指标和炎性因子的影响。方法选取盐城市第三人民医院2016年7月至2020年1月收治的60例重症高脂血症性ap患者采用随机数字表法分为对照组与试验组各30例。两组患者均实施常规治疗对照组患者行低分子肝素钙治疗试验组患者在对照组的基础上联合胰岛素治疗3 d为1个疗程均治疗4个疗程。比较两组患者的临床疗效治疗前后血脂水平、血淀粉酶及血清炎性因子水平。结果治疗后试验组患者的临床总有效率高于对照组与治疗前比治疗后两组患者总胆固醇、三酰甘油、血淀粉酶水平及血清tnfα、crp、il6水平均降低且试验组低于对照组均p 005。结论胰岛素联合低分子肝素钙可改善重症高脂血症性ap患者血脂和血淀粉酶水平抑制机体炎症反应缓解患者临床症状提高临床疗效。
en_title: Effects of insulin combined with low molecular weight heparin calcium on biochemical indexes and inflammatory factors in patients with severe hyperlipidemia AP
en_abstract: Objective To investigate the effect of insulin combined with low molecular weight heparin calcium on biochemical indexes and inflammatory factors in patients with severe hyperlipidemia AP. Methods Sixty patients with severe hyperlipidemia AP who were admitted to the Third People's Hospital of Yancheng City from July 2016 to January 2020 were selected and divided into the control group and the experimental group by random number table method, with 30 cases in each group. Both groups received routine treatment, the control group received low molecular weight heparin calcium therapy, and the experimental group received insulin therapy on the basis of the control group, 3 d as a course of treatment, and both received 4 courses of treatment. The clinical efficacy, blood lipid levels, blood amylase and serum inflammatory factor levels before and after treatment were compared between the two groups. Results After treatment, the clinical total effective rate of patients in the experimental group was higher than that in the control group; compared with before treatment, the levels of total cholesterol, triacylglycerol, blood amylase and serum TNF-α, CRP and IL-6 levels in the two groups after treatment were higher than those in the control group. decreased, and the experimental group was lower than the control group (all P < 0.05). Conclusion Insulin combined with low molecular weight heparin calcium can improve blood lipid and blood amylase levels in patients with severe hyperlipidemia AP, inhibit the body's inflammatory response, relieve clinical symptoms and improve clinical efficacy.

title: 宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术治疗输卵管积水对体外受精-胚胎移植成功率的影响
abstract: 目的探讨宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术治疗输卵管积水对患者体外受精-胚胎移植(IVF-ET)成功率的影响。方法选取因输卵管积水不孕行体外受精-胚胎移植的孕龄期妇女150例,随机分为对照组及观察组,各75例。对照组运用腹腔镜下近端输卵管根部结扎术进行IVF-ET前预处理,观察组运用宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术进行IVF-ET前预处理。比较两组患者手术时间、并发症发生率、术前卵泡刺激素水平及IVF-ET妊娠结局相关指标。结果两组患者手术并发症、术前卵泡刺激素水平比较差异无统计学意义;观察组手术时间明显低于对照组(P<0.05)。观察组与对照组受精率及卵裂率比较差异无统计学意义;流产率及异位妊娠率对照组明显高于观察组(P<0.05);观察组临床妊娠率明显高于对照组(P<0.05)。结论宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术具有创伤小、风险低、操作简单,提高临床妊娠率、降低流产率、异位妊娠率等优点,具有临床推广价值。
text: 宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术治疗输卵管积水对体外受精胚胎移植成功率的影响 目的探讨宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术治疗输卵管积水对患者体外受精胚胎移植ivfet成功率的影响。方法选取因输卵管积水不孕行体外受精胚胎移植的孕龄期妇女150例随机分为对照组及观察组各75例。对照组运用腹腔镜下近端输卵管根部结扎术进行ivfet前预处理观察组运用宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术进行ivfet前预处理。比较两组患者手术时间、并发症发生率、术前卵泡刺激素水平及ivfet妊娠结局相关指标。结果两组患者手术并发症、术前卵泡刺激素水平比较差异无统计学意义观察组手术时间明显低于对照组p005。观察组与对照组受精率及卵裂率比较差异无统计学意义流产率及异位妊娠率对照组明显高于观察组p005观察组临床妊娠率明显高于对照组p005。结论宫腔镜下近端输卵管栓塞术具有创伤小、风险低、操作简单提高临床妊娠率、降低流产率、异位妊娠率等优点具有临床推广价值。
en_title: Effect of hysteroscopic proximal tubal embolization for hydrosalpinx on the success rate of in vitro fertilization-embryo transfer
en_abstract: Objective To investigate the effect of hysteroscopic proximal tubal embolization in the treatment of hydrosalpinx on the success rate of in vitro fertilization-embryo transfer (IVF-ET). Methods A total of 150 women of gestational age who underwent in vitro fertilization-embryo transfer due to hydrosalpinx infertility were selected and randomly divided into control group and observation group, 75 cases in each group. The control group was treated with laparoscopic proximal tubal root ligation for pre-IVF-ET pretreatment, while the observation group was treated with hysteroscopic proximal tubal embolization for IVF-ET pre-treatment. The operation time, complication rate, preoperative follicle-stimulating hormone level and related indicators of IVF-ET pregnancy outcome were compared between the two groups. Results There was no significant difference in surgical complications and preoperative follicle-stimulating hormone levels between the two groups; the operation time of the observation group was significantly lower than that of the control group (P<0.05). There was no significant difference in the fertilization rate and cleavage rate between the observation group and the control group; the miscarriage rate and ectopic pregnancy rate in the control group were significantly higher than those in the observation group (P<0.05); the clinical pregnancy rate in the observation group was significantly higher than that in the control group (P<0.05). <0.05). Conclusion Hysteroscopic proximal tubal embolization has the advantages of small trauma, low risk, simple operation, increased clinical pregnancy rate, reduced miscarriage rate, ectopic pregnancy rate, etc., and has clinical promotion value.

title: 解牛蛙食品加工之困——湖北省农科院农产品加工与核农技术所畜禽与水产品加工研究
abstract: <正>牛蛙是北美洲最大的蛙类,成年体长一般在8～12 cm,最大体重可达2 kg,因雄蛙的鸣声似牛叫而得名,由于它的后腿肉味道鲜美而被广泛地引种饲养。于1959年被引入我国广东,此后在全国广泛推广饲养。现在除西藏、海南、香港和澳门外,北京以南所有省份(含台湾)均有养殖。
text: 解牛蛙食品加工之困——湖北省农科院农产品加工与核农技术所畜禽与水产品加工研究 正牛蛙是北美洲最大的蛙类成年体长一般在8～12 cm最大体重可达2 kg因雄蛙的鸣声似牛叫而得名由于它的后腿肉味道鲜美而被广泛地引种饲养。于1959年被引入我国广东此后在全国广泛推广饲养。现在除西藏、海南、香港和澳门外北京以南所有省份含台湾均有养殖。
en_title: Solving the Difficulties of Bullfrog Food Processing——Research on the Processing of Livestock, Poultry and Aquatic Products by the Institute of Agricultural Products Processing and Nuclear Agriculture Technology, Hubei Academy of Agricultural Sciences
en_abstract: <正>The bullfrog is the largest frog in North America. The adult body length is generally 8 to 12 cm, and the maximum weight can reach 2 kg. It is named after the sound of the male frog, which is similar to the call of a bull, and its hind legs are delicious. It is widely introduced and bred. It was introduced into Guangdong, my country in 1959, and has been widely promoted throughout the country since then. Now, except Tibet, Hainan, Hong Kong and Macau, all provinces south of Beijing (including Taiwan) have breeding.

title: 创新驱动发展  科技惠及民生——透视2014年度银行科技发展奖成果,掌握银行业技术创新趋势
abstract: <正>为贯彻落实党的十八届三中全会精神和国家关于深化科技体制改革和创新体系建设的要求,人民银行不断致力于全行业信息交流和成果共享平台的建设,促进银行业形成合力,定期组织开展银行业科技成果鉴定与评审,鼓励、引导各银行业金融机构实施"创新驱动发展"战略,近年来取得积极成效。
text: 创新驱动发展 科技惠及民生——透视2014年度银行科技发展奖成果掌握银行业技术创新趋势 正为贯彻落实党的十八届三中全会精神和国家关于深化科技体制改革和创新体系建设的要求人民银行不断致力于全行业信息交流和成果共享平台的建设促进银行业形成合力定期组织开展银行业科技成果鉴定与评审鼓励、引导各银行业金融机构实施创新驱动发展战略近年来取得积极成效。

en_abstract: <正>In order to implement the spirit of the Third Plenary Session of the 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the state's requirements for deepening the reform of the scientific and technological system and the construction of the innovation system, the People's Bank of China has been continuously committed to the construction of an industry-wide information exchange and achievement sharing platform to promote the formation of synergy in the banking industry. , regularly organize the appraisal and review of the scientific and technological achievements of the banking industry, encourage and guide the banking financial institutions to implement the "innovation-driven development" strategy, and have achieved positive results in recent years.

title: 关于《国家税务总局关于2020年第四季度油价调控风险准备金征收标准有关事项的公告》的解读
abstract: <正>现对《国家税务总局关于2020年第四季度油价调控风险准备金征收标准有关事项的公告》(以下简称《公告》)解读如下:一、有关背景自2019年1月1日起,油价调控风险准备金征管职责划转至税务部门。2020年一季度以来,受各种因素影响,国际原油价格持续低于国内成品油价格调控下限,触发了油价调控风险准备金征收条件,根据《油价调控风险准备金征收管理办法》(财税[2016]137号)有关规定,国家发展改革委将核定的四季度油价调控风险准备金征收标准通知税务总局。
text: 关于《国家税务总局关于2020年第四季度油价调控风险准备金征收标准有关事项的公告》的解读 正现对《国家税务总局关于2020年第四季度油价调控风险准备金征收标准有关事项的公告》以下简称《公告》解读如下一、有关背景自2019年1月1日起油价调控风险准备金征管职责划转至税务部门。2020年一季度以来受各种因素影响国际原油价格持续低于国内成品油价格调控下限触发了油价调控风险准备金征收条件根据《油价调控风险准备金征收管理办法》财税2016137号有关规定国家发展改革委将核定的四季度油价调控风险准备金征收标准通知税务总局。
en_title: Interpretation of the "Announcement of the State Administration of Taxation on Matters Concerning the Collection Standards for Oil Price Regulation Risk Reserves in the Fourth Quarter of 2020"
en_abstract: <正>The "Announcement of the State Administration of Taxation on Matters Concerning the Collection Standards of Oil Price Regulation Risk Reserves in the Fourth Quarter of 2020" (hereinafter referred to as the "Announcement") is hereby interpreted as follows: 1. Relevant background Since January 1, 2019, The responsibility for the collection and management of oil price control risk reserves is transferred to the tax department. Since the first quarter of 2020, affected by various factors, the international crude oil price has continued to be lower than the lower limit of domestic refined oil price control, triggering the conditions for the collection of oil price control risk reserves. ] No. 137), the National Development and Reform Commission will notify the State Administration of Taxation of the approved collection standards for oil price control risk reserves in the fourth quarter.

title: “项目引导、任务驱动”一体化教学在中职自动化专业教学中的实践探讨——以变频与伺服控制技术课程为例
abstract: 近年来,随着我国经济不断向高质量方向发展,制造业大国逐渐向制造业强国转变,国家提出了大力发展技工教育,加强技能人才队伍建设的目标,这给职业教育提出了更高的要求,技工院校怎样才能规模化培养出高质量的技能人才以促进就业和服务社会经济发展的需求,成了摆在学院发展面前的课题。文章通过对"项目引导、任务驱动"的一体化教学法进行分析,在变频与伺服控制技术课程中实践,让学生在完成具体项目的过程中构建专业知识体系,加深对知识的掌握能力,以提高课堂效率,改进教学效果。
text: “项目引导、任务驱动”一体化教学在中职自动化专业教学中的实践探讨——以变频与伺服控制技术课程为例 近年来随着我国经济不断向高质量方向发展制造业大国逐渐向制造业强国转变国家提出了大力发展技工教育加强技能人才队伍建设的目标这给职业教育提出了更高的要求技工院校怎样才能规模化培养出高质量的技能人才以促进就业和服务社会经济发展的需求成了摆在学院发展面前的课题。文章通过对项目引导、任务驱动的一体化教学法进行分析在变频与伺服控制技术课程中实践让学生在完成具体项目的过程中构建专业知识体系加深对知识的掌握能力以提高课堂效率改进教学效果。
en_title: Practical discussion on the integrated teaching of "project guidance and task drive" in the teaching of automation major in secondary vocational schools——Taking the course of frequency conversion and servo control technology as an example
en_abstract: In recent years, with the continuous development of my country's economy towards high-quality, the manufacturing power has gradually transformed into a manufacturing power. The state has put forward the goal of vigorously developing technical education and strengthening the construction of skilled personnel, which has put forward higher requirements for vocational education. , How can technical colleges cultivate high-quality skilled talents on a large scale to promote employment and serve the needs of social and economic development, has become a topic before the development of colleges. Through the analysis of the integrated teaching method of "project guidance and task drive", this paper puts it into practice in the course of frequency conversion and servo control technology, so that students can build a professional knowledge system in the process of completing specific projects, deepen their ability to master knowledge, and use the method to improve their knowledge and skills. Improve classroom efficiency and improve teaching effectiveness.
